English Sentences: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaalai koiro de7ees; qaalaikka Xoossaara issippe de7ees; qassi qaalai Xoossaa.

English Sentences: The same was in the beginning with God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaalai Xoossaara issippe koiro de7ees.

English Sentences: All things were made by him; and without him was not any thing made that was made.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ubbabaa qaalaa baggaara medhdhiis. Merettidabai ubbai i bainnan aibinne merettibeenna.

English Sentences: In him was life; and the life was the light of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aani de7oi de7ees; de7oi asau poo7o.

English Sentences: And the light shineth in darkness; and the darkness comprehended it not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Poo7oi xuman poo7ees; xumai poo7uwaa xoonibeenna.

English Sentences: There was a man sent from God, whose name was John.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai kiittido issi asi de7ees; a sunttai Yohaannisa.

English Sentences: The same came for a witness, to bear witness of the Light, that all men through him might believe.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai poo7uwaa baggaara ammanana mala, poo7uwaabaa markkattanau markka gididi yiis.

English Sentences: He was not that Light, but was sent to bear witness of that Light.
Wolaitta Sentences: Poo7uwaabaa markkattanau i yiidoogaappe attin, i ba huuphen poo7o gidenna.

English Sentences: That was the true Light, which lighteth every man that cometh into the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa ubbau poo7issiya tumu poo7oi sa7aa yees.

English Sentences: He was in the world, and the world was made by him, and the world knew him not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaalai sa7an de7iis; Xoossai Qaalan sa7aa medhdhiis; shin sa7ai a eribeenna.

English Sentences: He came unto his own, and his own received him not.
Wolaitta Sentences: I baageetukko yiis; shin aageeti a shiishshi ekkibookkona.

English Sentences: But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i bana shiishshi ekkida ubbatuyyo, ba sunttan ammanidaageetuyyo, Xoossaa naata gidana mala, maataa immiis.

English Sentences: Which were born, not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xoossaappe yelettidoogaappe attin, asi yeliyo maaran woi asa sheniyan woi attumaasa sheniyan yelettibookkona.

English Sentences: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaalai asa gididi, nu giddon de7iis. Nuuni a bonchchuwaa aaro kehatettainne tumatettai kumidoogaa be7ida. Aawaayyo issi Na7aa xalaala gidida i ekkido bonchchoi hagaa.

English Sentences: John bare witness of him, and cried, saying, This was he of whom I spake, He that cometh after me is preferred before me: for he was before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi abaa markkattiis; ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Taani, Taappe guyyeera yiyaagee taappe wolqqaamees; aissi giikko, taappe i kase de7iis gaada markkattidoogee hagaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni ubbai a kumetta aaro kehatettaappe anjjuwaa ekkida.

English Sentences: For the law was given by Moses, but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossai higgiyaa Muuse baggaara immiis; shin aaro kehatettainne tumatettai Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara yiis.

English Sentences: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa be7ida asi mulekka baawa; ba Aawaa lanqqiyan de7iya issi Na7aa xalaalai abaa markkattiis.

English Sentences: And this is the record of John, when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him, Who art thou?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaamen de7iya Aihudati qeesetanne Leewata, "Neeni oonee?" giidi Yohaannisa oichchana mala, Yohaannisakko kiittin, Yohaannisi etau markkattido markkatettai hagaa.

English Sentences: And he confessed, and denied not; but confessed, I am not the Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi, "Taani Kiristtoosa gidikke" yaagidi geeshshidi markkattidoogaappe attin, markkattiyoogaa ixxibeenna.

English Sentences: And they asked him, What then? Art thou Elias? And he saith, I am not. Art thou that prophet? And he answered, No.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Yaatin, neeni oonee? Neeni Eelaaseeyye?" yaagidi oichchidosona. Oichchin Yohaannisi, "Akkai gidikke" yaagiis. Qassikka eti, "Neeni hananabaa yootiyaagee?" yaagidi oichchidosona. Oichchin Yohaannisi, "Akkai" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: Then said they unto him, Who art thou? that we may give an answer to them that sent us. What sayest thou of thyself?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, "Neeni oonee? Nuuni nuna kiittidaageetuyyo yootana mala, neeni nebaa woigai?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He said, I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness, Make straight the way of the Lord, as said the prophet Esaias.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi zaaridi, "Hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi giidoogaadan, bazzon ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Godaa ogiyaa sitti oottite! giya cenggurssai taagaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Parisaaweti kiittido asati

English Sentences: And they asked him, and said unto him, Why baptizest thou then, if thou be not that Christ, nor Elias, neither that prophet?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisa, "Neeni Kiristtoosa woi, Eelaasa woi hananabaa yootiyaagaa gidana xayikko, yaatin aissi xammaqai?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: John answered them, saying, I baptize with water: but there standeth one among you, whom ye know not;
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yohaannisi zaaridi, "Taani haattan xammaqais; shin intte erenna asi intte giddon eqqiis.

English Sentences: He it is, who coming after me is preferred before me, whose shoe's latchet I am not worthy to unloose.
Wolaitta Sentences: I taappe guyyeera yees. Taani a caammaa qashuwaa birshshanaukka bessikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan, where John was baptizing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee ubbai Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefinttan Biitaaniyaa giyo biittan, Yohaannisi xammaqiyoosan haniis.

English Sentences: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him, and saith, Behold the Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi wonttetta gallassi Yesuusi baakko yiishin be7idi yaagiis; "Xoossaa dorssai, sa7aa nagaraa xaissiyaagee, hageeho!

English Sentences: This is he of whom I said, After me cometh a man which is preferred before me: for he was before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, Taappe guyyeera issi asi yaana; i taappe wolqqaama; aissi giikko, taappe kase de7iis gaada haasayidoogee hagaa.

English Sentences: And I knew him not: but that he should be made manifest to Israel, therefore am I come baptizing with water.
Wolaitta Sentences: I oonakko taani erikke; shin Israa7eela asau a qonccissanaassi haattan xammaqaidda yaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And John bare record, saying, I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove, and it abode upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi hagaadan yaagidi markkattiis; "Geeshsha Ayyaanai saluwaappe haraphphedan wodhdhishiininne a bolli uttishin, taani be7aas.

English Sentences: And I knew him not: but he that sent me to baptize with water, the same said unto me, Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending, and remaining on him, the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a erikke; shin haattan xammaqanau tana kiittidaagee, Geeshsha Ayyaanai wodhdhidi, issi asa bolli uttishin, neeni be7ana; Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqanaagee a yaagidi taayyo yootiis.

English Sentences: And I saw, and bare record that this is the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hegaa be7ada, Xoossaa Na7aa i gididoogaa markkattais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Again the next day after John stood, and two of his disciples;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi wonttetta gallassi Yohaannisi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77atuura issippe eqqiis;

English Sentences: And looking upon Jesus as he walked, he saith, Behold the Lamb of God!
Wolaitta Sentences: eqqidi Yesuusi aadhdhishin be7idi, "Xoossaa dorssai hageeho!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the two disciples heard him speak, and they followed Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi erissiyo naa77u ashkkarati Yohaannisi giyoogaa siyidi, Yesuusa kaallidosona.

English Sentences: Then Jesus turned, and saw them following, and saith unto them, What seek ye? They said unto him, Rabbi, (which is to say, being interpreted, Master,) where dwellest thou?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi bana kaalliyaageeta guyye simmi be7idi, "Ai koyeetii?" yaagidi oichchiis. Eti zaaridi, "Rabii, neeni awan de7ai?" yaagidosona. "Rabii" giyoogee "Tamaarissiyaagoo" giyoogaa.

English Sentences: He saith unto them, Come and see. They came and saw where he dwelt, and abode with him that day: for it was about the tenth hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Haa yiidi be7ite" yaagiis. Yaagin eti biidi, i de7iyoosaa be7idosona; he gallassi eti sa7ai tammu saate heera gidiyo gishshau, a matan pe7idosona.

English Sentences: One of the two which heard John speak, and followed him, was Andrew, Simon Peter's brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi giidoogaa siyidi, Yesuusa kaallida naa77u asatuppe issoi, Simoon PHeexiroosa ishaa Inddiraasa.

English Sentences: He first findeth his own brother Simon, and saith unto him, We have found the Messias, which is, being interpreted, the Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inddiraasi koiro ba ishaa Simoonaara gaittidi, "Nuuni Masiyaara gaittida" yaagiis. "Masiyaa" giyoogee "Kiristtoosa" giyoogaa.

English Sentences: And he brought him to Jesus. And when Jesus beheld him, he said, Thou art Simon the son of Jona: thou shalt be called Cephas, which is by interpretation, A stone.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inddiraasi Simoona Yesuusakko ekki ehiis. Ehin Yesuusi Simoona be7idi, "Neeni Yoona na7aa Simoona; ne sunttai Keefa gidana" yaagiis. "Keefa" giyoogaa birshshettainne "PHeexiroosa" giyoogaa birshshettai issuwaa; hegaa giyoogee "SHuchchaa" giyoogaa.

English Sentences: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee, and findeth Philip, and saith unto him, Follow me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi Yesuusi Galiila giyo biitti baanau qofaa qachchiis; i Piliphphoosaara gaittidi, "Tana kaalla!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now Philip was of Bethsaida, the city of Andrew and Peter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Piliphphoosi Inddiraasinne PHeexiroosi de7ido Beetasaida giyo katamaappe yiida asa.

English Sentences: Philip findeth Nathanael, and saith unto him, We have found him, of whom Moses in the law, and the prophets, did write, Jesus of Nazareth, the son of Joseph.
Wolaitta Sentences: Piliphphoosi Naatinaa7eelaara gaittidi, "Higgiyaa maxaafan Muusee abaa xaafidogaa, qassi hananabaa yootiyaageetikka abaa xaafido Yooseefa na7aa Yesuusaara, Naazireete kataman de7iyaagaara, nuuni gaittida" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Nathanael said unto him, Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth? Philip saith unto him, Come and see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naatinaa7eeli zaaridi, "Naazireete katamaappe payyabi kiyanau danddayii?" yaagiis. Yaagin Piliphphoosi, "Yaada be7a" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him, and saith of him, Behold an Israelite indeed, in whom is no guile!
Wolaitta Sentences: Naatinaa7eeli baakko yiyaagaa Yesuusi be7idi, "Genee bainna tumu Israa7eela asi hagaa!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Nathanael saith unto him, Whence knowest thou me? Jesus answered and said unto him, Before that Philip called thee, when thou wast under the fig tree, I saw thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Naatinaa7eeli Yesuusa, "Neeni tana awan erai?" yaagiis. Yesuusi zaaridi, "Piliphphoosi nena xeesanaappe kase, neeni balasiyaa giyo mittaa garssan de7ishin, taani nena be7aas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Nathanael answered and saith unto him, Rabbi, thou art the Son of God; thou art the King of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naatinaa7eeli zaaridi, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, neeni Xoossaa Na7aa! Neeni Israa7eela kawuwaa!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto him, Because I said unto thee, I saw thee under the fig tree, believest thou? thou shalt see greater things than these.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Taani nena balasiyo giyo mittee garssan be7aas giido gishshau ammanai? Neeni hagaappe aadhdhiyaabaa be7ana!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he saith unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Hereafter ye shall see heaven open, and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Yesuusi, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; saloi dooyettin, Xoossaa kiitanchchati ta bolli, Asa Na7aa bolli, pude kiyishiininne duge wodhdhishin, intte be7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee; and the mother of Jesus was there:
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzantto gallassi Galiila biittan Qaana giyo kataman bullachchi bullashettiis; Yesuusa aayyiyaa he bullachchan de7ausu.

English Sentences: And both Jesus was called, and his disciples, to the marriage.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusikka ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe he bullachchaa xeesettiis.

English Sentences: And when they wanted wine, the mother of Jesus saith unto him, They have no wine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woiniyaa eessai wuriichchin, Yesuusa aayyiyaa Yesuusa, "Etau woiniyaa eessai wuriichchiis" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, what have I to do with thee? mine hour is not yet come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Ha maccaasee, nena gattiyaabi aibee? Ta wodee birooni gakkibeenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: His mother saith unto the servants, Whatsoever he saith unto you, do it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa aayyiyaa ashkkarata, "I intteyyo odiyoobaa aiba gidikkonne oottite" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And there were set there six waterpots of stone, after the manner of the purifying of the Jews, containing two or three firkins apiece.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati haimaanootiyau oottiyoogaadan, meechchaa wogaayyo issoi issoi heezzu heezzu oto oiqqiya usuppun shuchcha baattati hegan de7oosona.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto them, Fill the waterpots with water. And they filled them up to the brim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ashkkarata, "Baattatun haattaa kunttite" yaagiis; yaagin eti baattatuyyo doonaa gakkanaassi haattaa kunttidosona.

English Sentences: And he saith unto them, Draw out now, and bear unto the governor of the feast. And they bare it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Ha77i duuqqidi, bullachchaa alaafiyau immite" yaagiis; eti ayyo efiidi immidosona.

English Sentences: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine, and knew not whence it was: (but the servants which drew the water knew;) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom,
Wolaitta Sentences: Bullachchaa alaafee woine eessa gidida haattaa ganxxi xeellidi, auppe yiidaakkonne eribeenna; shin haattaa kunttida ashkkarati eroosona. Bullachchaa alaafee machchiyo ekkiyaagaa xeesidi,

English Sentences: And saith unto him, Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine; and when men have well drunk, then that which is worse: but thou hast kept the good wine until now.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ooninne aife woine eessaa asaa kasetidi ushshees; yaatidi bullachchaasai daro uyidoogaappe guyyiyan, qiraariyaa ushshees. SHin neeni aife woine eessaa hanno gakkanaassi wotta bayadasa!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee, and manifested forth his glory; and his disciples believed on him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba oottido wolqqaama malaatatuppe hagaa koiruwaa Galiila biittan Qaana giyo kataman oottiis; hegan ba bonchchuwaa qonccissiis. Qassi erissiyo ashkkaratikka a ammanidosona.

English Sentences: After this he went down to Capernaum, he, and his mother, and his brethren, and his disciples: and they continued there not many days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi ba aayeera, ba ishanttuuranne ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe Qifirinaahooma giyo katamaa biis; biidi amarida gallassaa takkiis.

English Sentences: And the Jews' passover was at hand, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati bonchchiyo Paasikaa Baalaa gallassai matattin, Yesuusi Yerusalaame biis.

English Sentences: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves, and the changers of money sitting:
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi Beeta Maqidasiyan miizzaa, dorssaanne haraphphiyaa baizziya asaa demmiis; qassi harati bantta oidiyan uttidi, miishshaa laammiyaageeta demmiis.

English Sentences: And when he had made a scourge of small cords, he drove them all out of the temple, and the sheep, and the oxen; and poured out the changers' money, and overthrew the tables;
Wolaitta Sentences: I golaa xurqqayyiyaa dooqqidi, eta ubbaa dorssaaranne miizzaara Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kare kessidi yedettiis. Miishshaa laammiyaageetu xaraphpheezaakka aatti yeggidi, eta miishshaa laaliis.

English Sentences: And said unto them that sold doves, Take these things hence; make not my Father's house an house of merchandise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haraphphiyaa baizziyaageeta i, "Ha haraphpheta hagaappe kessite; ta Aawaa keettaa giya oottoppite!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And his disciples remembered that it was written, The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati Xoossaa maxaafan, "Taani ne keettau mishettiyo mishoi tana tamadan xuuggees" geetettidi xaafettidaagaa hassayidosona.

English Sentences: Then answered the Jews and said unto him, What sign shewest thou unto us, seeing that thou doest these things?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Aihudati zaaridi, "Neeni hagaa oottana danddayiyoogau nuna ai malaata bessuutee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto them, Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolite; taani heezzu gallassan zaarettada keexxana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said the Jews, Forty and six years was this temple in building, and wilt thou rear it up in three days?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Aihudati, "Ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanau oitamanne usuppun laittaa ekkiis; shin neeni heezzu gallassan keexxuutee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he spake of the temple of his body.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i haasayiyo Beeta Maqidasee ba asatettaa.

English Sentences: When therefore he was risen from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them; and they believed the scripture, and the word which Jesus had said.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan, erissiyo ashkkarati i hegaa giidoogaa hassayidosona. Qassi eti Xoossaa maxaafaagaanne Yesuusi haasayidoogaa ammanidosona.

English Sentences: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover, in the feast day, many believed in his name, when they saw the miracles which he did.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paasikaa bonchchiyoosan Yesuusi Yerusalaamen de7ishin, i oottido malaataa be7idi, daro asai a ammaniis.

English Sentences: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them, because he knew all men,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi he asaa ubbaa eriyo gishshau, eta ammanibeenna.

English Sentences: And needed not that any should testify of man: for he knew what was in man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asabaa ooninne ayyo markkattana mala koyibeenna; aissi giikko, asa wozanan aibi de7iyaakko, i ba huuphen erees.

English Sentences: There was a man of the Pharisees, named Nicodemus, a ruler of the Jews:
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaawetu baggan Aihudatuyyo halaqa gidiya Niqoodimoosa giyo issi bitanee de7ees.

English Sentences: The same came to Jesus by night, and said unto him, Rabbi, we know that thou art a teacher come from God: for no man can do these miracles that thou doest, except God be with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Niqoodimoosi qammi Yesuusakko yiidi, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, neeni Xoossai kiittido tamaarissiyaagaa gidiyoogaa nuuni eroos; aissi giikko, Xoossai aara de7iyo asappe attin, ha neeni oottiyo wolqqaama malaatata oottanau danddayiya asi baawa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani neeyyo tumaa odais; ooninne naa77antto yelettana xayikko, Xoossaa kawotettaa be7anau danddayenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Nicodemus saith unto him, How can a man be born when he is old? can he enter the second time into his mother's womb, and be born?
Wolaitta Sentences: Niqoodimoosi, "Cima asi waanidi naa77antto yelettanau danddayii? Ba aayee uluwaa simmi gelidi, naa77anttuwaa yelettanau asi danddayii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani neeyyo tumaa odais; ooninne haattaappenne Geeshsha Ayyaanaappe yelettana xayikko, Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asappe yelettidaagee asa; Ayyaanaappe yelettidaagee ayyaana;

English Sentences: Marvel not that I said unto thee, Ye must be born again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte naa77antto yelettanau bessees gaada taani intteyyo odido gishshau, neeni garamettoppa.

English Sentences: The wind bloweth where it listeth, and thou hearest the sound thereof, but canst not tell whence it cometh, and whither it goeth: so is every one that is born of the Spirit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Carkkoi ba koyidosaa carkkees. Neeni a kooshinchchaa siyaasa; shin i auppe yiyaakko woi au biyaakko, neeni erakka. Ayyaanaappe yelettida ubbai hegaa mala" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Nicodemus answered and said unto him, How can these things be?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Niqoodimoosi, "Hagee waanidi hananau danddayii?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto him, Art thou a master of Israel, and knowest not these things?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Neeni Israa7eelata tamaarissiyaagaa gidaidda hagaa erikkii?

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto thee, We speak that we do know, and testify that we have seen; and ye receive not our witness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeyyo tumaa odais; nuuni eriyoogaa haasayoosinne be7idoogaa markkattoos; shin nuuni markkattiyoogaa intte ekkekketa.

English Sentences: If I have told you earthly things, and ye believe not, how shall ye believe, if I tell you of heavenly things?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo sa7aabaa yootin, intte ammanennaageeta gidikko, saluwaabaa yootin waani ammanuuteetii?

English Sentences: And no man hath ascended up to heaven, but he that came down from heaven, even the Son of man which is in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaappe wodhdhida taappe Asa Na7aappe attin, saluwaa kiyidabi ooninne baawa; saluwan de7iya Asa Na7ai tana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, even so must the Son of man be lifted up:
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee bazzon shooshshaa kaqqidoogaadan,

English Sentences: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have eternal life.
Wolaitta Sentences: tana ammanida ubbai merinaa de7uwaa ekkana mala, taani Asa Na7ai kaqettanau bessees.

English Sentences: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Na7aa ammaniya ubbai merinaa de7uwaa ekkanaappe attin, xayenna mala, Xoossai ha sa7aa keehi siiqido gishshau, ba mexi issi Na7aa immiis.

English Sentences: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world; but that the world through him might be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossai ba Na7aa ha sa7aa pirddanau kiittibeenna; shin sa7aa a baggaara ashshanau kiittiis.

English Sentences: He that believeth on him is not condemned: but he that believeth not is condemned already, because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7aa ammaniya ooninne pirddettenna; shin Na7aa ammanenna ooninne, Xoossaa Na7aa issuwaa ammanibeenna gishshau, ha77ikka pirddetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And this is the condemnation, that light is come into the world, and men loved darkness rather than light, because their deeds were evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa bolli pirddiyo pirddai hagaa; poo7oi sa7aa yiis; shin asaa oosoi iita gidiyo gishshau, asai poo7uwaappe aattidi, xumaa siiqees.

English Sentences: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light, neither cometh to the light, lest his deeds should be reproved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitabaa oottiya ooninne poo7o ixxees; aissi giikko, ba oosoi qonccenna mala, poo7uwaakko shiiqenna.

English Sentences: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light, that his deeds may be made manifest, that they are wrought in God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin tumaa oottiya ooninne Xoossai azazidoogaadan, i oottidoogaa poo7oi qonccissana mala, poo7uwaakko shiiqees.

English Sentences: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea; and there he tarried with them, and baptized.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati Yihudaa biitti biidosona; Yesuusi he biittan etaara amarida wodiyaa uttidi, asaa xammaqiis.

English Sentences: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim, because there was much water there: and they came, and were baptized.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yohaannisi Saleema matan de7iya Henoona giyoosan gooba haattai de7iyo gishshau, asaa xammaqees; asai yi yiidi xammaqettees.

English Sentences: For John was not yet cast into prison.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi biron qashettiichchibeenna.

English Sentences: Then there arose a question between some of John's disciples and the Jews about purifying.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkaratinne amarida Aihudati meechchaabaa palamettidosona.

English Sentences: And they came unto John, and said unto him, Rabbi, he that was with thee beyond Jordan, to whom thou barest witness, behold, the same baptizeth, and all men come to him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yohaannisakko biidi, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefinttan nenaara de7iyaagee, neeni abaa markkattidoogee, be7a ha77i xammaqees; asai ubbaikka akko bees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: John answered and said, A man can receive nothing, except it be given him from heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi zaaridi, "Xoossai immana xayikko, asi ainne ekkanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: Ye yourselves bear me witness, that I said, I am not the Christ, but that I am sent before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Kiristtoosa gidikke; shin taani appe sinttau kiitettaas giidoogau taayyo intte intte huuphen markka.

English Sentences: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom: but the friend of the bridegroom, which standeth and heareth him, rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom's voice: this my joy therefore is fulfilled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bullachchiyo maccaasiyaa de7iyo urai bullachchiyaagaa; he bullachchiyaagaa laggee eqqidi, i giyoogaa siyiyaagee bullachchiyaagaa haasayan daro ufaittees. Hegaa gishshau, hagee ta ufaissai polettiis.

English Sentences: He must increase, but I must decrease.
Wolaitta Sentences: I gitatana bessees; taani qassi guuxxana bessees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: He that cometh from above is above all: he that is of the earth is earthly, and speaketh of the earth: he that cometh from heaven is above all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bollappe yiyaagee ubbaappe bolla. Sa7aappe beettidaagee sa7aabaa; i qassi sa7aabaa haasayees. Saluwaappe yiyaagee ubbaappe bolla.

English Sentences: And what he hath seen and heard, that he testifieth; and no man receiveth his testimony.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba be7idobaanne siyidobaa markkattees; shin a markkatettaa ekkiyai baawa.

English Sentences: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true.
Wolaitta Sentences: A markkatettaa ekkiya ooninne Xoossai tumanchcha gidiyoogaa hegan markkattees.

English Sentences: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God: for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai kiittidoogee Xoossaa qaalaa yootees; aissi giikko, Xoossai ba Geeshsha Ayyaanaa palahissidi immees.

English Sentences: The Father loveth the Son, and hath given all things into his hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba Na7aa siiqees; siiqidi ubbabaa a kushiyan wottiis.

English Sentences: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7aa ammaniya urau merinaa de7oi de7ees; shin Na7aa ammanennaagaa bolli Xoossaa hanqqoi de7anaagaappe attin, i de7o be7enna.

English Sentences: When therefore the LORD knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Yohaannisaagaappe dariya kaalliyaageeta baakko shiishsheesinne xammaqees giyoogaa Parisaaweti siyidoogaa Yesuusi erido wode,

English Sentences: (Though Jesus himself baptized not, but his disciples,)
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaappe aggidi, Galiila biis;

English Sentences: He left Judaea, and departed again into Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: gidikkokka, erissiyo ashkkarati xammaqidoogaappe attin, Yesuusi ba huuphen oonanne xammaqibeenna.

English Sentences: And he must needs go through Samaria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Galiila biiddi, Samaariyaara aadhdhanaagee a ashshennabaa gidiis.

English Sentences: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria, which is called Sychar, near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yaaqoobi ba na7aa Yooseefayyo immido gadiyaa matan de7iya Sikaara giyo Samaariyaa katamaa biis.

English Sentences: Now Jacob's well was there. Jesus therefore, being wearied with his journey, sat thus on the well: and it was about the sixth hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwan Yaaqooba haattaa ollai de7ees; Yesuusi hemetan daafuridi, he haattaa ollaa matan uttiis. He wode sa7ai usuppun saate heera.

English Sentences: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water: Jesus saith unto her, Give me to drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Samaariyaa katamaa maccaasa issinniyaa haattaa duuqqanau yaasu; Yesuusi he maccaasiyo, "Tana haattaa ushsharkkii!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: (For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati quma shammanau katamaa biidosona.

English Sentences: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him, How is it that thou, being a Jew, askest drink of me, which am a woman of Samaria? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans.
Wolaitta Sentences: He maccaasiyaa zaarada, "Neeni Aihuda asa gidaidda, Samaariyaa maccaasa gidiya tana, waata haattaa ushsha gai?" yaagaasu; aissi giikko, Aihudati Samaaretuura giigettokkona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto her, If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi o, "Neeni Xoossai immiyoobaanne qassi nena haattaa ushsha giyaagee oonakko eriyaabaa gidiyaakko, a woossana shin; i neeyyo de7o haattaa immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The woman saith unto him, Sir, thou hast nothing to draw with, and the well is deep: from whence then hast thou that living water?
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa zaarada, "Godau, neeyyo duuqqiyoobi baawa; ollaikka ziqqa. Yaatin, de7o haattaa auppe ekkuutee?

English Sentences: Art thou greater than our father Jacob, which gave us the well, and drank thereof himself, and his children, and his cattle?
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuyyo ha haattaa ollaa immida nu aawaa Yaaqoobappe neeni gitatai? I, a naatinne a mehee hagaappe uyidosona" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto her, Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Ha haattaappe uyida ooninne naa77anttuwaa saamettana.

English Sentences: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani immana haattaa uyiya ooninne mulekka saamettenna. Taani immana haattai he aawu giddon merinaa de7uwau pulttiya pultto gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The woman saith unto him, Sir, give me this water, that I thirst not, neither come hither to draw.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa zaarada, "Godau, taani saamettenna malanne haattaa tikkanaukka ha sohuwaa yeenna mala, taayyo he haattaa imma!" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto her, Go, call thy husband, and come hither.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi o, "Baada ne azinaa xeesada haa ya" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The woman answered and said, I have no husband. Jesus said unto her, Thou hast well said, I have no husband:
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa zaarada, "Tau azini baawa" yaagaasu. Yaagin Yesuusi o, "Tau azini baawa giyoogaa balabaakka.

English Sentences: For thou hast had five husbands; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband: in that saidst thou truly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ichchashu azinaa geladasa; ha77i nenaara de7iya bitanee ne azina gidenna. Neeni ha77i tau odidoogee tuma" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The woman saith unto him, Sir, I perceive that thou art a prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa zaarada, "Godau, neeni hananabaa yootiyaagaa gidennan aggakka;

English Sentences: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain; and ye say, that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship.
Wolaitta Sentences: nu aawati ha deriyan goinnidosona; shin Aihudati intte asi Xoossau goinnanau bessiya sohoi Yerusalaameena yaageeta" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, believe me, the hour cometh, when ye shall neither in this mountain, nor yet at Jerusalem, worship the Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Ha maccaasee tana ammana; ha deriyan woi Yerusalaamen Aawaayyo intte goinnenna wodee yaana.

English Sentences: Ye worship ye know not what: we know what we worship: for salvation is of the Jews.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Samaariyaa asai intte erennabau goinneeta; atotettai Aihudatuppe yiyo gishshau, nuuni Aihudati nu eriyoogau goinnoos.

English Sentences: But the hour cometh, and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Aawau tumaappe goinniyaageeti ayyaanaaninne tumatettan goinniyo wodee matattiis; ha77ikka gakkiichchiis. Aissi giikko, asi baayyo goinnana mala, Aawai koyiyoogeeti hageetu malaa.

English Sentences: God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ayyaana; qassi au goinniyaageeti ayyaanaaninne tumatettan goinnanau bessees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The woman saith unto him, I know that Messias cometh, which is called Christ: when he is come, he will tell us all things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa zaarada, "Kiristtoosa giyo masee yaanaagaa taani erais. I yiyo wode nuuyyo ubbabaa yootana" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto her, I that speak unto thee am he.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Ha nenaara haasayiya taani a" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And upon this came his disciples, and marvelled that he talked with the woman: yet no man said, What seekest thou? or, Why talkest thou with her?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hinno eti haasayishin, Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati biidosaappe simmidosona. Yesuusi maccaaseera haasayishin, eti be7idi daro garamettidosona; shin maccaasiyo, "Ai koyai?" giidai woi Yesuusa, "Iira aissi haasayai?" giidai ooninne baawa.

English Sentences: The woman then left her waterpot, and went her way into the city, and saith to the men,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, maccaasiyaa ba haatta otuwaa agga bayada, guyye katamaa baasu; baada asau,

English Sentences: Come, see a man, which told me all things that ever I did: is not this the Christ?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani oottidobaa ubbaa taayyo yootida bitaniyaa be7anau hinddite; hegee Kiristtoosa gidanddeeshsha?" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Then they went out of the city, and came unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai katamaappe kiyidi, Yesuusakko biis.

English Sentences: In the mean while his disciples prayed him, saying, Master, eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee hanishin, erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa, "Guuttabaa markkii!" yaagidi woossidosona.

English Sentences: But he said unto them, I have meat to eat that ye know not of.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i, "Taayyo intte erenna qumai taani maanaagee de7ees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore said the disciples one to another, Hath any man brought him ought to eat?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, erissiyo ashkkarati bantta giddon, "Ayyo miyoobaa ehiida asi de7anddeeshsha?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi etau, "Ta qumai tana kiittidaagee koyiyoobaa oottanaagaanne a oosuwaa polanaagaa.

English Sentences: Say not ye, There are yet four months, and then cometh harvest? behold, I say unto you, Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte, Oiddu aginappe guyyiyan, kattai cakettana geekketiiyye? Taani intteyyo odais; goshshaa loitti xeellite; kattai cahaa bessiis.

English Sentences: And he that reapeth receiveth wages, and gathereth fruit unto life eternal: that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zeriyaageenne cakkiyaagee issippe ufaittana mala, cakkiyaagee damoozaa ekkeesinne kattaa merinaa de7uwau shiishshees.

English Sentences: And herein is that saying true, One soweth, and another reapeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Issoi zerees; qassi issoi cakkees giyo haasayai tuma.

English Sentences: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour: other men laboured, and ye are entered into their labours.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte daafuribeennaagaa cakkana mala, taani inttena kiittaas; harati ootti daafuridosona; intte haratu daafuran gelideta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman, which testified, He told me all that ever I did.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa, "I taani oottido ubbabaa yootiis" gaada markkattido gishshau, he kataman de7iya Samaariyaa asaappe daroi Yesuusa ammaniis.

English Sentences: So when the Samaritans were come unto him, they besought him that he would tarry with them: and he abode there two days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Samaariyaa asai Yesuusakko yiido wode, bantta matan takkana mala, Yesuusa woossidosona; woossin i yaani naa77u gallassaa uttiis.

English Sentences: And many more believed because of his own word;
Wolaitta Sentences: I yootiyo qaalaa gishshau, kaseegaappe daro asai ammaniis;

English Sentences: And said unto the woman, Now we believe, not because of thy saying: for we have heard him ourselves, and know that this is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi eti maccaasiyo, "Nuuni nu huuphen i giyoogaa siyidi ammanidoogaappe attin, neeni markkattido gishshassa gidenna; qassi i tumu ha sa7aa ashshiyaagaa gidiyoogaakka nuuni eroos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Now after two days he departed thence, and went into Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77u gallassappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi yaappe kiyidi, Galiila biitti biis.

English Sentences: For Jesus himself testified, that a prophet hath no honour in his own country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Yesuusi ba huuphen, "Hananabaa yootiyaagee ba biittan bonchchettenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then when he was come into Galilee, the Galilaeans received him, having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast: for they also went unto the feast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Galiila gakkido wode, Galiila asai a mokkiis; aissi giikko, Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi eti Yerusalaamen de7iyo gishshau, i oottido ubbabaa be7idosona.

English Sentences: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee, where he made the water wine. And there was a certain nobleman, whose son was sick at Capernaum.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi haattaa woine eessa kessido, Galiilan de7iya Qaana katamaa biis. Qifirinaahooman a na7ai sahettiyo kawo keettan oottiya issi halaqai de7ees.

English Sentences: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee, he went unto him, and besought him that he would come down, and heal his son: for he was at the point of death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Yihudaappe Galiila yiidoogaa he halaqai siyidi, akko yiis. Yiidi haiquwau matida ba na7aa biidi pattana mala, Yesuusa woossiis.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto him, Except ye see signs and wonders, ye will not believe.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi halaqaa, "Xoossai oottiyo malaataanne garamissiyaabaa be7ennan de7iiddi, intte mulekka ammanekketa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The nobleman saith unto him, Sir, come down ere my child die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Halaqai zaaridi, "Godau, ta na7ai haiqqennan de7ishin, tanaara hinddarkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto him, vGo thy way; thy son liveth. And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him, and he went his way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Ba; ne na7ai paxana!" yaagiis. He halaqai Yesuusi giidoogaa ammanidi, aggidi biis.

English Sentences: And as he was now going down, his servants met him, and told him, saying, Thy son liveth.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba soo biishin, a ashkkarati aara ogiyan gaittidi a, "Ne na7ai paxa de7ees" giidosona.

English Sentences: Then enquired he of them the hour when he began to amend. And they said unto him, Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba ashkkarata ba na7au ai saatiyan kehidaakkonne oichchin eti, "Zine laappun saatiyan mishoi a aggiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So the father knew that it was at the same hour, in the which Jesus said unto him, Thy son liveth: and himself believed, and his whole house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin na7aa aawai Yesuusi baayyo, "Ne na7ai paxana" giidoogee likke he saatiyaana gididoogaa hassayiis. Hegaa gishshau, inne a so asai ubbai ammaniis.

English Sentences: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did, when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee Yesuusi Yihudaappe Galiila yiidi oottido naa77antto wolqqaama malaataa.

English Sentences: After this there was a feast of the Jews; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Aihudati bonchchiyo baalaayyo Yerusalaame biis.

English Sentences: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool, which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda, having five porches.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaamen dorssaa penggiyaa matan Ibraisxxe qaalan Beetasaida giyo dagatti uttida haattai de7ees; he dagatti uttida haattaa yuuyi aadhdhida ichchashu baranddai de7ees.

English Sentences: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk, of blind, halt, withered, waiting for the moving of the water.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan haattai qaaxxiyoogaa naagiya daro hargganchcha asati, qooqeti, wobbetinne silati zin77i uttidosona.

English Sentences: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool, and troubled the water: whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, issi issitoo Godaa kiitanchchai dagattida haattaakko biidi, haattaa qaattees; haattai qaaxxidoogaappe guyyiyan, koiro gelida urai bana oiqqida ai harggiyaappekka paxees.

English Sentences: And a certain man was there, which had an infirmity thirty and eight years.
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwan hasttamanne hosppun laitta sahettida issi bitanee de7ees.

English Sentences: When Jesus saw him lie, and knew that he had been now a long time in that case, he saith unto him, Wilt thou be made whole?
Wolaitta Sentences: He bitanee hegan zin77idaagaa Yesuusi be7idi, qassi daro wodiyaa sahettidoogaa eridi bitaniyaa, "Paxanau koyai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The impotent man answered him, Sir, I have no man, when the water is troubled, to put me into the pool: but while I am coming, another steppeth down before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sahettiya bitanee zaaridi, "Godau, haattai qaaxxiyo wode, tana dagattida haattan yeggiya asi baawa; shin taani gelana haniyo wode, hara urai taappe kasetidi geliichchees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto him, Rise, take up thy bed, and walk.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi a, "Dendda eqqa; ne arssaa tookkada ba" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And immediately the man was made whole, and took up his bed, and walked: and on the same day was the sabbath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee sohuwaarakka paxi aggiis; ba arssaa tookkidi biis. Hegee hanidoogee Sambbata gallassaana.

English Sentences: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured, It is the sabbath day: it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Aihudati paxida bitaniyaa, "Hachchi sa7ai Sambbata; neeni ne arssaa tookkiyoogee higge gidenna" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He answered them, He that made me whole, the same said unto me, Take up thy bed, and walk.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin bitanee, "Tana pattidaagee, Ne arssaa tookkada ba yaagiis" yaagidi etau zaariis.

English Sentences: Then asked they him, What man is that which said unto thee, Take up thy bed, and walk?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a, "Nena, Ne arssaa tookkada ba giidaagee i oonee?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he that was healed wist not who it was: for Jesus had conveyed himself away, a multitude being in that place.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi he sohuwan daro asai de7iyaagaa giddo gelidi geemettido gishshau, bitanee bana pattida asi oonakkonne erenna.

English Sentences: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple, and said unto him, Behold, thou art made whole: sin no more, lest a worse thing come unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi guyyeppe he bitaniyaa Beeta Maqidasiyan demmidi, "Be7a, neeni paxadasa; hagaappe iitabai nena gakkenna mala, naa77antto nagara oottoppa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The man departed, and told the Jews that it was Jesus, which had made him whole.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, bitanee biidi, bana pattidaagee Yesuusa gididoogaa Aihudatuyyo odiis.

English Sentences: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus, and sought to slay him, because he had done these things on the sabbath day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hagaa Sambbatan oottido gishshau, Aihudati Yesuusa waisuwaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: But Jesus answered them, My Father worketh hitherto, and I work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi etayyo, "Ta Aawai ubba wode oottees; taanikka oottanau bessees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him, because he not only had broken the sabbath, but said also that God was his Father, making himself equal with God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yesuusi Sambbata gallassaa bonchchenna gishsha xalaalaassa gidennan, bana Xoossaara giigissidi, "Xoossai ta Aawaa" giido gishshau, Aihudati a woranau kaseegaappe minttidi koyoosona.

English Sentences: Then answered Jesus and said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, The Son can do nothing of himself, but what he seeth the Father do: for what things soever he doeth, these also doeth the Son likewise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi etau, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; Na7ai barkka ainne oottenna. I ba Aawai oottishin be7iyoogaa xalaalaa oottees; Aawai oottiyoogaa Na7aikka oottees.

English Sentences: For the Father loveth the Son, and sheweth him all things that himself doeth: and he will shew him greater works than these, that ye may marvel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Aawai ba Na7aa siiqees; qassi i oottiyo ooso ubbabaa ba Na7aa bessees. Intte garamettana mala, i hagaappe aadhdhiya oosuwaakka ba Na7aa bessana.

English Sentences: For as the Father raiseth up the dead, and quickeneth them; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Aawai haiqqidaageeta haiquwaappe denttidi, paxa wottiyoogaadan, Na7aikka qassi ba siiqiyoogeeta paxa wottees.

English Sentences: For the Father judgeth no man, but hath committed all judgment unto the Son:
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai Aawaa bonchchiyoogaadan, Na7aakka bonchchana mala,

English Sentences: That all men should honour the Son, even as they honour the Father. He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawai pirdda ubbaa Na7au immidoogaappe attin, i oonanne pirddenna; Na7aa bonchchenna uri, Na7aa kiittida Aawaakka bonchchenna.

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that heareth my word, and believeth on him that sent me, hath everlasting life, and shall not come into condemnation; but is passed from death unto life.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; ta qaalaa siyiyaagaunne tana kiittidaagan ammaniyaagau merinaa de7oi de7ees. Haiquwaappe de7uwau i pinnidoogaappe attin, pirddettenna.

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto you, The hour is coming, and now is, when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God: and they that hear shall live.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; haiqqida asai Xoossaa Na7aa cenggurssaa siyiyo wodee yaana; ha77ikka yees. He cenggurssaa siyiyaageeti paxa de7ana.

English Sentences: For as the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Aawai banan de7oi de7iyoogaadan, ba Na7aanikka de7oi de7ana mala oottiis.

English Sentences: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also, because he is the Son of man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawai Na7aayyo pirddiyo maataa immiis; aissi giikko, Na7ai Asa Na7aa.

English Sentences: Marvel not at this: for the hour is coming, in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagan garamettoppite; aissi giikko, duufuwan de7iyaageeti a cenggurssaa siyiyo wodee yees.

English Sentences: And shall come forth; they that have done good, unto the resurrection of life; and they that have done evil, unto the resurrection of damnation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyidi eti duufuwaappe gaxi kiyana; lo77obaa oottidaageeti de7anau denddana; qassi iitabaa oottidaageeti pirddettanau denddana.

English Sentences: I can of mine own self do nothing: as I hear, I judge: and my judgment is just; because I seek not mine own will, but the will of the Father which hath sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani tarkka ainne oottanau danddayikke; Xoossai tau odidoogaadan pirddais. Ta pirddai tuma; aissi giikko, taani tana kiittidaagee dosiyoobaa oottiyoogaappe attin, taani dosiyoogaa oottikke.

English Sentences: If I bear witness of myself, my witness is not true.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani tabaa markkattikko, ta markkatettai tuma gidenna.

English Sentences: There is another that beareth witness of me; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tabaa markkattiya harai de7ees; qassi i tabaa markkattiyoogee tuma gidiyoogaa taani erais.

English Sentences: Ye sent unto John, and he bare witness unto the truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte Yohaannisakko asa kiittin, i tumau markkattiis.

English Sentences: But I receive not testimony from man: but these things I say, that ye might be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hegaa inttena attona gaada giyoogaappe attin, asa markkatetti tana koshshiina gidenna.

English Sentences: He was a burning and a shining light: and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi muqaaddadan, eexxiisinne poo7issiis; qassi intte amarida wodiyaa a poo7uwan ufaittanau koyideta.

English Sentences: But I have greater witness than that of John: for the works which the Father hath given me to finish, the same works that I do, bear witness of me, that the Father hath sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin tau Yohaannisaagaappe aadhdhiya markkatettai de7ees; aissi giikko, taani wurssanau Aawai taayyo immido oosoi, ha taani oottiyoogee, Aawai tana kiittidoogaa tabaa markkattees.

English Sentences: And the Father himself, which hath sent me, hath borne witness of me. Ye have neither heard his voice at any time, nor seen his shape.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi tana kiittida Aawaikka ba huuphen tabaa markkattees. Intte a cenggurssaa mulekka siyibeekketa; a meraakka be7ibeekketa.

English Sentences: And ye have not his word abiding in you: for whom he hath sent, him ye believe not.
Wolaitta Sentences: I kiittidoogaa intte ammanenna gishshau, a qaalai intte wozanan baawa.

English Sentences: Search the scriptures; for in them ye think ye have eternal life: and they are they which testify of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xoossaa maxaafatuppe merinaa de7uwaa demmiyoobaa intteyyo milatin, eta xanna7eeta; etikka tabaa markkattoosona.

English Sentences: And ye will not come to me, that ye might have life.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin de7uwaa demmanau taakko yiyoogaa intte koyekketa.

English Sentences: I receive not honour from men.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Asi tana bonchchanaagaa koyikke.

English Sentences: But I know you, that ye have not the love of God in you.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani intte wozanan Xoossaa siiqoi bainnaagaa erais.

English Sentences: I am come in my Father's name, and ye receive me not: if another shall come in his own name, him ye will receive.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta Aawaa sunttan yaas; shin tana mokkibeekketa. Hara asi ba sunttan yiyo wode, a mokkeeta.

English Sentences: How can ye believe, which receive honour one of another, and seek not the honour that cometh from God only?
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte issoi issuwaa bonchcheeta; shin issi Xoossaappe yiya bonchchuwaa koyekketa. Yaatin, waanidi ammananau danddayeetii?

English Sentences: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father: there is one that accuseth you, even Moses, in whom ye trust.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani Aawan inttena mootiyoobaa intteyyo milatoppo; inttena intte demmana giidi ufaissan naagiyo Muusee mootana.

English Sentences: For had ye believed Moses, ye would have believed me: for he wrote of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Muusa ammanidabaa gidiyaakko, tanakka ammanana; aissi giikko, tabaa xaafidai a.

English Sentences: But if ye believe not his writings, how shall ye believe my words?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte i xaafidoogaa ammanennan ixxikko, taani giyoogaa waanidi ammanuuteetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee, which is the sea of Tiberias.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Galiila abbaappe woi Xibiriyaadoosa abbaappe hefintti pinniis.

English Sentences: And a great multitude followed him, because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hargganchchatu bolli oottido wolqqaama malaataa be7ido gishshau, daro asai a kaalliis.

English Sentences: And Jesus went up into a mountain, and there he sat with his disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi deriyaa kiyidi, yaani ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe uttiis.

English Sentences: And the passover, a feast of the Jews, was nigh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati bonchchiyo Paasikaa gallassai gakkiis.

English Sentences: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes, and saw a great company come unto him, he saith unto Philip, Whence shall we buy bread, that these may eat?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi sinttaukko xeellidi, daro asai baakko yiyaagaa be7iis; be7idi Piliphphoosa, "Ha asaa ubbaa mizanau gidiya qumaa auppe shammanee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And this he said to prove him: for he himself knew what he would do.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegaa Piliphphoosa paaccanau giis; aissi giikko, i ba huuphen ai oottanaakkonne erees.

English Sentences: Philip answered him, Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them, that every one of them may take a little.
Wolaitta Sentences: Piliphphoosi zaaridi Yesuusa, "Huuphiyan huuphiyan, harai atto issi issi barssa gattanau, naa77u xeetu biran shammido oittaikka gidenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: One of his disciples, Andrew, Simon Peter's brother, saith unto him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi, Simoon PHeexiroosa ishai Inddiraasi,

English Sentences: There is a lad here, which hath five barley loaves, and two small fishes: but what are they among so many?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Bangga oitta ichchashainne naa77u molee de7iyo issi na7ai hagan de7ees; shin ha asa ubbau hegee ai maaddanee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said, Make the men sit down. Now there was much grass in the place. So the men sat down, in number about five thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarata, "Asaa utissite" yaagiis. He sohuwan daro maatai de7ees. Asai ubbai uttiis; attumaasaa qoodai ichchashu sha7aa gidana.

English Sentences: And Jesus took the loaves; and when he had given thanks, he distributed to the disciples, and the disciples to them that were set down; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi oittaa ekkiis; Xoossaa galatidi, hegan uttida asaayyo gishiis. Moliyaakka hegaadan oottiis; oottin asai ba koyidoogaa keenaa miis.

English Sentences: When they were filled, he said unto his disciples, Gather up the fragments that remain, that nothing be lost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbai kallidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata, "Issibaikka moorettenna mala, attida xarzzaa shiishshite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore they gathered them together, and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves, which remained over and above unto them that had eaten.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eti ubbaakka shiishshidosona; asai miishin attida bangga oittaa xarzzaa shiishshidi, tammanne naa77u samppaa kunttidosona.

English Sentences: Then those men, when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did, said, This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Yesuusi oottido wolqqaama malaataa be7ido wode, "Hagee tumaappe ha sa7aa yaana giido hananabaa yootiyaagaa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force, to make him a king, he departed again into a mountain himself alone.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yiidi bana oiqqidi, wolqqan kawo oottanau haniyoogaa Yesuusi eridi, barkka deriyaa bolli naa77anttuwaa kiyiis.

English Sentences: And when even was now come, his disciples went down unto the sea,
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai omarido wode, Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati abbaakko biidosona;

English Sentences: And entered into a ship, and went over the sea toward Capernaum. And it was now dark, and Jesus was not come to them.
Wolaitta Sentences: wolwoluwan gelidi, abbaa pinnidi, Qifirinaahooma biidosona. Sa7aikka qammiichchiis; shin Yesuusi biron etakko yibeenna.

English Sentences: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wolqqaama carkkoi carkkido gishshau, abbai qaaxxees;

English Sentences: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs, they see Jesus walking on the sea, and drawing nigh unto the ship: and they were afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: ichchashu woikko usuppun kilo meetire gidiyaagaa keenaa eti abbaa shaaroogaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi abbaa bollaara hemettiiddi yiyaagaa be7idi yayyidosona.

English Sentences: But he saith unto them, It is I; be not afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i, "Yayyoppite; tanattennee!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then they willingly received him into the ship: and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti wolwoluwan a gelissanau koyidosona; sohuwaarakka wolwoloi eti biyoosaa abbaa gaxaa gakki aggiis.

English Sentences: The day following, when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there, save that one whereinto his disciples were entered, and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat, but that his disciples were gone away alone;
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi, abbaappe hefinttaara attida daro asai issi wolwolo xalaalai de7iyaagaa be7iis; Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura wolwoluwan gelidi, etaara beennan, eti banttarkka biidoogaa akeekidosona.

English Sentences: (Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread, after that the Lord had given thanks:)
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xibiriyaadoosappe hara wolwoloti Yesuusi Xoossaa galatin, asai oittaa miidosaa heeraa yiidosona.

English Sentences: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there, neither his disciples, they also took shipping, and came to Capernaum, seeking for Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Yesuusi woi erissiyo ashkkarati hegan bainnaagaa be7idi, Yesuusa koyanau wolwoluwan gelidi, Qifirinaahooma biidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea, they said unto him, Rabbi, when camest thou hither?
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Yesuusa abbaappe hefinttan demmido wode, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, hagaa aude yaadii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered them and said, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Ye seek me, not because ye saw the miracles, but because ye did eat of the loaves, and were filled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; intte tana koyiyoogee oittaa miido gishshassanne kallido gishshassa gidiyoogaappe attin, wolqqaama malaata be7ido gishshassa gidenna.

English Sentences: Labour not for the meat which perisheth, but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life, which the Son of man shall give unto you: for him hath God the Father sealed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Merinaa de7o qumau, taani Asa Na7ai intteyyo immanaagau, oottiteppe attin, samiya qumau oottoppite; aissi giikko, Aawai Xoossai a bolli gido giyo paramaa parami wottiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said they unto him, What shall we do, that we might work the works of God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan eti, "Nuuni Xoossaa oosuwaa oottanau ai oottanee?" yaagidi Yesuusa oichchidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto them, This is the work of God, that ye believe on him whom he hath sent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Intte oottana mala, Xoossai koyiyo oosoi hagaa; i kiittidoogaa ammanite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They said therefore unto him, What sign shewest thou then, that we may see, and believe thee? what dost thou work?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaaridi, "Nuuni be7idi, nena ammanana mala, ai wolqqaama malaata oottuutee? Ai oottuutee?

English Sentences: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert; as it is written, He gave them bread from heaven to eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa maxaafai, Eti maanau saluwaappe oittaa immiis giyoogaadan, nu aawati bazzon mannaa miidosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Moses gave you not that bread from heaven; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; intteyyo saluwaappe tumu oittaa immiyaagee ta Aawaa gidiyoogaappe attin, intteyyo saluwaappe oittaa immidaagee Muusa gidenna.

English Sentences: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven, and giveth life unto the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossaa oittai saluwaappe wodhdhiyaagee sa7au de7uwaa immees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said they unto him, Lord, evermore give us this bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaaridi, "Godau, nuuyyo he oittaa ubba wode imma" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto them, I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Taani de7o oitta; taakko yiya urai mulekka namisettenna. Qassi tana ammaniya urai mulekka saamettenna.

English Sentences: But I said unto you, That ye also have seen me, and believe not.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani intteyyo odaas; intte tana be7ideta; shin ammanekketa.

English Sentences: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta Aawai tau immiyo ubbai taakko yaana; qassi taakko yiya oonanne mulekka taani wora yeddikke.

English Sentences: For I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani tana kiittidaagee koyiyoogaa oottanau saluwaappe yaasippe attin, ta koyiyoogaa oottanau yabeikke.

English Sentences: And this is the Father's will which hath sent me, that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing, but should raise it up again at the last day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana kiittidaagee koyiyoogee hagaa; taani i tau immido ubbatakka wurssettaa gallassi denttanaappe attin, issuwaakka bashshana mala koyenna.

English Sentences: And this is the will of him that sent me, that every one which seeth the Son, and believeth on him, may have everlasting life: and I will raise him up at the last day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta Aawai koyiyoogee hagaa; tana Na7aa be7idi, ammaniya ubbati merinaa de7uwaa ekkana; taanikka he ubbata wurssettaa gallassi denttana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The Jews then murmured at him, because he said, I am the bread which came down from heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Taani saluwaappe wodhdhida oittaa" giido gishshau, Aihudati a bolli zuuzummidosona.

English Sentences: And they said, Is not this Jesus, the son of Joseph, whose father and mother we know? how is it then that he saith, I came down from heaven?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Hagee nuuni a aawaanne a aayyiyo eriyo Yooseefa na7aa Yesuusa gidennee? Yaatin, i woigidi, Taani saluwaappe wodhdhaas gaanau danddayii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them, Murmur not among yourselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Issoi issuwaara zuuzummiyoogaa aggite.

English Sentences: No man can come to me, except the Father which hath sent me draw him: and I will raise him up at the last day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana kiittida ta Aawai taakko ehiido asappe attin, taakko yaanau danddayiya asi baawa; taanikka wurssettaa gallassi a denttana.

English Sentences: It is written in the prophets, And they shall be all taught of God. Every man therefore that hath heard, and hath learned of the Father, cometh unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiyaageeti, Xoossai asa ubbaa tamaarissana yaagidi xaafidosona; Aawai giyoogaa siyiyaageenne Aawaappe tamaariyaagee ooninne taakko yees.

English Sentences: Not that any man hath seen the Father, save he which is of God, he hath seen the Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa matappe yiidaagaappe attin, Xoossaa be7ida asi baawa; a xalaalai Xoossaa be7iis.

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that believeth on me hath everlasting life.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; tana ammaniya urau merinaa de7oi de7ees.

English Sentences: I am that bread of life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani de7o oitta.

English Sentences: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness, and are dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte aawati bazzon mannaa miidosona; shin haiqqidosona.

English Sentences: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven, that a man may eat thereof, and not die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi appe miidi haiqqenna oittai saluwaappe yiyaagee hagaa.

English Sentences: I am the living bread which came down from heaven: if any man eat of this bread, he shall live for ever: and the bread that I will give is my flesh, which I will give for the life of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaappe wodhdhida de7o oittai tana; ooninne ha oittaappe miikko, merinau de7ana; qassi ha sa7ai de7ana mala, taani immana oittai ta ashuwaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The Jews therefore strove among themselves, saying, How can this man give us his flesh to eat?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati, "Ha bitanee ba ashuwaa nuuni maana mala, nuuyyo waatidi immanau danddayii?" yaagidi bantta giddon palamettidosona.

English Sentences: Then Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man, and drink his blood, ye have no life in you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yesuusi eta, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; ta ashuwaa, Asa Na7aa ashuwaa, intte maana xayikko, qassi ta suuttaakka intte uyana xayikko, inttenan de7oi baawa.

English Sentences: Whoso eateth my flesh, and drinketh my blood, hath eternal life; and I will raise him up at the last day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta ashuwaa miya uraunne, ta suuttaa uyiya uraunne merinaa de7oi de7ees. Taani wurssettaa gallassi a denttana.

English Sentences: For my flesh is meat indeed, and my blood is drink indeed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta ashoi tumu quma; ta suuttaikka tumu ushsha.

English Sentences: He that eateth my flesh, and drinketh my blood, dwelleth in me, and I in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta ashuwaa miya urainne ta suuttaa uyiya urai tanaara de7ees; taanikka aara de7ais.

English Sentences: As the living Father hath sent me, and I live by the Father: so he that eateth me, even he shall live by me.
Wolaitta Sentences: De7o Aawai tana kiittin, taani a gaasuwan de7iyoogaadan, tana miya uraikka ta gaasuwan de7ana.

English Sentences: This is that bread which came down from heaven: not as your fathers did eat manna, and are dead: he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaappe wodhdhida oittai hagaa; intte aawati miidi haiqqido mannaa mala gidenna; ha oittaa miya urai merinau de7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: These things said he in the synagogue, as he taught in Capernaum.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Qifirinaahooma kataman Aihuda woosa keettan tamaarissiiddi, hagaa yaagiis.

English Sentences: Many therefore of his disciples, when they had heard this, said, This is an hard saying; who can hear it?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe dariya baggai hegaa siyido wode, "Hagee gelenna timirtte; hagee ooyyo gelii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it, he said unto them, Doth this offend you?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarati hegau zuuzummidoogaa eridi, "Hagee inttena xubbii?

English Sentences: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin taani, Asa Na7ai, kase de7iyoosaa pude kiyishin be7iyaakko waanuuteetii?

English Sentences: It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshsha Ayyaanai de7uwaa immees; ashoi ainne go77enna. Taani intteyyo yootido qaalai ayyaananne de7o.

English Sentences: But there are some of you that believe not. For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not, and who should betray him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte giddon ammanennaageeti de7oosona" yaagiis; aissi giikko, ammanennaageeti augeetakko Yesuusi kaseesappe doommidi erees. Qassi bana aatti immanaageetakka erees.

English Sentences: And he said, Therefore said I unto you, that no man can come unto me, except it were given unto him of my Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Yesuusi, "Aawai ba geennan ooninne taakko yaanau danddayenna taani giidoogee hegaa gishshassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: From that time many of his disciples went back, and walked no more with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gaasuwan, Yesuusa kaalliyaageetuppe daroti a aggi bayidi, guyye simmidosona; naa77antto a kaallibookkona.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto the twelve, Will ye also go away?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qassi ba tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata, "Inttekka aggi bayidi baanau koyeetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Simon Peter answered him, Lord, to whom shall we go? thou hast the words of eternal life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoon PHeexiroosi zaaridi, "Godau, nuuni ookko baanee? Neeyyo merinaa de7uwaa qaalai de7ees.

English Sentences: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ, the Son of the living God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni Xoossaa geeshshaa gidiyoogaa nuuni ammanoosinne eroos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered them, Have not I chosen you twelve, and one of you is a devil?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta, "Taani inttena tammanne naa77ata doorabeikkinaa? Qassi intteppe issoi xalahe" yaagiis.

English Sentences: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon: for he it was that should betray him, being one of the twelve.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa Simoona na7aa Yihudaa Asqqoroota gees; aissi giikko, Yihudai tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issuwaa; i Yesuusa aatti immanaagaa.

English Sentences: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee: for he would not walk in Jewry, because the Jews sought to kill him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Galiilan yaa haa yuuyiis; Aihudati a woranau koyiyo gishshau, Yihudan yuuyana koyibeenna.

English Sentences: Now the Jews' feast of tabernacles was at hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati bonchchiyo Daase Baalai gakki uttiis.

English Sentences: His brethren therefore said unto him, Depart hence, and go into Judaea, that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yesuusa ishantti a, "Ne erissiyo ashkkarati neeni oottiyoogaa be7ana mala, hagaappe denddada Yihudaa biitti ba.

English Sentences: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret, and he himself seeketh to be known openly. If thou do these things, shew thyself to the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, baayyo erettanau koyiya asi ooninne ba ooso genttenna. Neeni hageeta oottiyaabaa gidikko, nebaa sa7aa erissa!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: For neither did his brethren believe in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, harai atto a ishanttikka a ammanibookkona.

English Sentences: Then Jesus said unto them, My time is not yet come: but your time is alway ready.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Tau injjetiya wodee gakkibeenna; shin intteyyo ai wodeekka injjetees.

English Sentences: The world cannot hate you; but me it hateth, because I testify of it, that the works thereof are evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai inttena ixxanau danddayenna; shin taani sa7aa oosoi iita gidiyoogaa markkattiyo gishshau, tana ixxees.

English Sentences: Go ye up unto this feast: I go not up yet unto this feast: for my time is not yet full come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baalaa bonchchiyoosaa intte biite; tau injjetiya wodee gakkibeenna gishshau, taani baalaa bonchchiyoosaa baanaagee biroona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When he had said these words unto them, he abode still in Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hagaa giidi, Galiilan attiis.

English Sentences: But when his brethren were gone up, then went he also up unto the feast, not openly, but as it were in secret.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin a ishantti baala gallassaa bonchchiyoosaa biidoogaappe guyyiyan, ikka asi be7ennan geeman he sohuwaa biis.

English Sentences: Then the Jews sought him at the feast, and said, Where is he?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati baala gallassaa bonchchiyoosan a koyoosonanne, "I awan de7ii?" yaagiiddi, a lal77oosona.

English Sentences: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa giddon daro zuuzunttai denddiis. Amarida asai, "I lo77o asa" yaagees; harati qassi, "Akkai; i asa balettees" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Aihudatuyyo yayyido gishshau, ooninne abaa qoncciyan haasayenna.

English Sentences: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baala gallassaa bonchchiyoogee baggettin, Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaa biidi, tamaarissuwaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And the Jews marvelled, saying, How knoweth this man letters, having never learned?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati garamettidi, "Ha bitanee ainne tamaarennan hagaa keeni waani eridee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered them, and said, My doctrine is not mine, but his that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani tamaarissiyoogee tana kiittida Xoossaa matappe yiyoogaappe attin, tabaa gidenna.

English Sentences: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa sheniyaa oottanau dosiya ooninne ha taani tamaarissiyoogee Xoossaa matappe yiyaakko woi qassi taani ta huupheppe haasayiyaakko erana.

English Sentences: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory: but he that seeketh his glory that sent him, the same is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Babaa haasayiya urai ba huuphessi bonchcho koyees; shin bana kiittidaagaa bonchchuwaa koyiya urai tumanchcha; aani worddoi baawa.

English Sentences: Did not Moses give you the law, and yet none of you keepeth the law? Why go ye about to kill me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee intteyyo higgiyaa immibeennee? SHin intteppe issoinne higgiyaa naagenna. Tana aissi woranau koyeetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The people answered and said, Thou hast a devil: who goeth about to kill thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai zaaridi, "Nenan xalahee de7ees; nena woranau oonee koyidai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto them, I have done one work, and ye all marvel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Taani issi wolqqaamabaa oottin, intte ubbai garamettideta.

English Sentences: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision; (not because it is of Moses, but of the fathers;) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaxxarai intte aawatuura yiidoogaappe attin, Muuseera yibeenna; shin intte naata intte qaxxarana mala, Muusee inttena azazido gishshau, intte Sambbatan naata qaxxareeta.

English Sentences: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision, that the law of Moses should not be broken; are ye angry at me, because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day?
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee higgee azazido gishshau, intte Sambbatan qaxxariyaabaa gidikko, yaatin taani issi asayyo kumetta bollaa pattido gishshau, tana aissi hanqqetteetii?

English Sentences: Judge not according to the appearance, but judge righteous judgment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tumu pirddaa pirdditeppe attin, asa som77o xeellidi pirddoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said some of them of Jerusalem, Is not this he, whom they seek to kill?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yerusalaame asaappe issooti issooti, "Eti woranau koyiyo bitanee hagaa gidennee?

English Sentences: But, lo, he speaketh boldly, and they say nothing unto him. Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ?
