Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, qoncciyan i haasayees; eti a ainne gookkona. Hagee Kiristtoosa gidiyoogaa halaqati tumu eriyoonaashsha?

English Sentences: Howbeit we know this man whence he is: but when Christ cometh, no man knoweth whence he is.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuuni i auppe yiidaakko eroos; Kiristtoosi yiyo wode, i auppe yiyaakkonne ooninne erenna" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught, saying, Ye both know me, and ye know whence I am: and I am not come of myself, but he that sent me is true, whom ye know not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissiiddi, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Intte tana ereeta; qassi taani awappe yiidaakkokka ereeta. Taani ta shenen yabeikke; shin tana kiittidaagee tumanchcha; intte a erekketa.

English Sentences: But I know him: for I am from him, and he hath sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani a erais; aissi giikko, i tana kiittin, taani a matappe yaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then they sought to take him: but no man laid hands on him, because his hour was not yet come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eti a oiqqanau koyidosona; shin a wodee birooni gakkibeenna gishshau, ooninne a bolli kushe wottibeenna.

English Sentences: And many of the people believed on him, and said, When Christ cometh, will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin daro asai Yesuusa ammanidi, "Kiristtoosi yiyo wode, ha bitanee oottido malaataappe xoqqiyaagaa oottaneeyye?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaaweti daro asai Yesuusabaa zuuzummiyoogaa siyidosona; qeese halaqatinne Parisaaweti a oitti qashissanau amarida wotaaddarata kiittidosona.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto them, Yet a little while am I with you, and then I go unto him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Taani inttenaara guuttaa takkana; hegaappe guyyiyan, tana kiittidaagaakko baana.

English Sentences: Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte tana koyana; shin demmekketa; aissi giikko, taani de7iyoosaa intte baanau danddayekketa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said the Jews among themselves, Whither will he go, that we shall not find him? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles, and teach the Gentiles?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati issoi issuwaara, "Hagee nuuni demmennasaa awa baana hanii? Aihudati de7iyo Giriike katamaa biidi, Giriiketa tamaarissanau haniiyye?

English Sentences: What manner of saying is this that he said, Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come?
Wolaitta Sentences: I, Intte tana koyana; shin demmekketa qassi, Taani de7iyoosaa intte baanau danddayekketa yaagees; hegaa giyoogee woigiyoogee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: He baala gallassaa bonchchiyo gallassaappe waannatiya wurssetta gallassan Yesuusi denddi eqqidi, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Saamettida urai ooninne taakko yiidi uyo.

English Sentences: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanan ammaniyaagau, Xoossaa maxaafai giyoogaadan, a uluwaappekka de7o haattaa shaafai goggana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet given; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegaa a ammanidaageeti ekkana Geeshsha Ayyaanaabaa haasayiis. Yesuusi biron bonchchettiichchibeenna gishshau, he wode Geeshsha Ayyaanai imettiichchibeenna.

English Sentences: Many of the people therefore, when they heard this saying, said, Of a truth this is the Prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: He asaappe dariya baggai i giyoogaa siyidi, "Tumu hagee hananabaa yootiyaagaa!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Others said, This is the Christ. But some said, Shall Christ come out of Galilee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Harati, "Hagee Kiristtoosa" yaagidosona. SHin harati qassi, "Kiristtoosi Galiilappe waani kiyii?

English Sentences: Hath not the scripture said, That Christ cometh of the seed of David, and out of the town of Bethlehem, where David was?
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa maxaafai, Kiristtoosi Daawita zariyaappe Daawiti de7ido Beetaliheeme katamaappe yaana geenneeyye?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So there was a division among the people because of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa gaasuwan asai ba giddon shaahettiis.

English Sentences: And some of them would have taken him; but no man laid hands on him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He asaappe issooti issooti a oiqqanau koyidosona; shin kushiyaaninne a bochchibookkona.

English Sentences: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees; and they said unto them, Why have ye not brought him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarati qeese halaqatukkonne Parisaawetukko simmidosona; simmin eti Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata, "Aissi a ehibeekketii?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarati etau, "Ha bitanee haasayidoogaadan, mulekka ooninne haasayibeenna!" yaagidi zaaridosona.

English Sentences: Then answered them the Pharisees, Are ye also deceived?
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaaweti zaaridi, "I inttenakka balettidee?

English Sentences: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Halaqatuppe woi Parisaawetuppe a ammanida asi de7ii?

English Sentences: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin higgiyaa erenna ha asai qanggettidaagaa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Nicodemus saith unto them, (he that came to Jesus by night, being one of them,)
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe kase issoi qammi Yesuusakko biida Niqoodimoosi eta,

English Sentences: Doth our law judge any man, before it hear him, and know what he doeth?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi urai giyoobaa siyennan woi i ai oottidaakko erennan de7iiddi, kasetidi a bolli pirddiyoogee nu higgiyan de7ii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They answered and said unto him, Art thou also of Galilee? Search, and look: for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti zaaridi a, "Neenikka qassi Galiila biittaa asee? Galiila biittaappe hananabaa yootiyaabi beettennaagaa Xoossaa maxaafata marammarada era" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And every man went unto his own house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai aggidi, ba soo ba soo biis.

English Sentences: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi Dabira Zaite Deriyaakko biis.

English Sentences: And early in the morning he came again into the temple, and all the people came unto him; and he sat down, and taught them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi wonttetta gallassi guuran Beeta Maqidasiyaa simmiis; daro asai akko yin, uttidi eta tamaarissiis.

English Sentences: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery; and when they had set her in the midst,
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti shaaramuxishin oiqqido issi mishiriyo akko ekki ehiidosona. Eti asa ubbaa sinttan o essidi Yesuusa,

English Sentences: They say unto him, Master, this woman was taken in adultery, in the very act.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tamaarissiyaagoo, ha mishiriyaa shaaramuxaidda ohettaasu.

English Sentences: Now Moses in the law commanded us, that such should be stoned: but what sayest thou?
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa bolli Muusee hanni mala maccaasa shuchchan caddana mala, nuna azaziis. Yaatin neeni woigai?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: This they said, tempting him, that they might have to accuse him. But Jesus stooped down, and with his finger wrote on the ground, as though he heard them not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaa giidoogee Yesuusa mootiyoobaa demmidi a paaccanaassa; shin Yesuusi hokkidi, ba biradhdhiyan biittaa bolli xaafiis.

English Sentences: So when they continued asking him, he lifted up himself, and said unto them, He that is without sin among you, let him first cast a stone at her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a oichchidi aggennan ixxin, pude xoqqu giidi, "Intte giddon nagara oottibeenna asi kasetidi, o shuchchan caddo" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And again he stooped down, and wrote on the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka hokkidi, biittaa bolli xaafiis.

English Sentences: And they which heard it, being convicted by their own conscience, went out one by one, beginning at the eldest, even unto the last: and Jesus was left alone, and the woman standing in the midst.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaa siyido wode, kasetidi cimati kiyin, issoi issoi kiyiiddi wuridosona; wurin Yesuusa xalaalai hegan eqqida mishireera attiis.

English Sentences: When Jesus had lifted up himself, and saw none but the woman, he said unto her, Woman, where are those thine accusers? hath no man condemned thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: I pude xoqqu giidi mishiriyo, "Mishiree, asati awan de7iyoonaa? Ooninne ne bolli pirddibeennee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: She said, No man, Lord. And Jesus said unto her, Neither do I condemn thee: go, and sin no more.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin mishiriyaa, "Godau, ooninne ta bolli pirddibeenna" yaagaasu. Yesuusi o, "Taanikka ne bolli pirddikke; ba; naa77anttada nagara oottoppa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then spake Jesus again unto them, saying, I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Yesuusi asau, "Taani sa7au poo7o; tana kaalliya ooninne de7o poo7uwaa ekkanaappe attin, xuman mulekka hemettenna" yaagidi haasayiis.

English Sentences: The Pharisees therefore said unto him, Thou bearest record of thyself; thy record is not true.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Parisaaweti, "Neeni nebaa markkattaasa; ne markkatettai tuma gidenna" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto them, Though I bear record of myself, yet my record is true: for I know whence I came, and whither I go; but ye cannot tell whence I come, and whither I go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani tabaa markkattikkokka, ta markkatettai tuma; aissi giikko, taani awappe yiidaakkonne qassi awa biyaakko, intte erekketa.

English Sentences: Ye judge after the flesh; I judge no man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi pirddiyo ogiyan intte pirddeeta; taani issi uraa bollikka pirddikke.

English Sentences: And yet if I judge, my judgment is true: for I am not alone, but I and the Father that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani pirddiyaabaa gidikkokka, ta pirddai tuma; aissi giikko, tana kiittida ta Aawai tanaara de7eesippe attin, taani tarkka de7ikke.

English Sentences: It is also written in your law, that the testimony of two men is true.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77u asa markkatettai tuma gidiyoogee intte higgiyan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: I am one that bear witness of myself, and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani tabaa ta huuphen markkattais; qassi tana kiittida ta Aawaikka tabaa markkattees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said they unto him, Where is thy Father? Jesus answered, Ye neither know me, nor my Father: if ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti, "Ne aawai awan de7ii?" yaagidi Yesuusa oichchidosona. Yesuusi zaaridi, "Intte tanakka woi ta Aawaakka erekketa; tana eridabaa gidiyaakko, intte ta Aawaakka erana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: These words spake Jesus in the treasury, as he taught in the temple: and no man laid hands on him; for his hour was not yet come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissiiddi, muxuwaata miishshaa yeggiyo saaxiniyaa matan hegaa haasayiis. A ooninne oiqqibeenna; aissi giikko, a wodee biron gakkiichchibeenna.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus again unto them, I go my way, and ye shall seek me, and shall die in your sins: whither I go, ye cannot come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Yesuusi eta, "Taani baana. Bin intte tana koyana; shin intte intte nagaran haiqqana. Taani biyoosaakka baanau intte danddayekketa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said the Jews, Will he kill himself? because he saith, Whither I go, ye cannot come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati, "I, Taani biyoosaa intte baanau danddayekketa yaagees; i bana barkka woraneeyye?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Ye are from beneath; I am from above: ye are of this world; I am not of this world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Intte garssa asa; taani bolla asa. Intte ha sa7aa asa; taani ha sa7aa asa gidikke.

English Sentences: I said therefore unto you, that ye shall die in your sins: for if ye believe not that I am he, ye shall die in your sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte intte nagaran haiqqanaagaa taani intteyyo yootidoogee hegaassa; taani tana gidiyoogaa intte ammanana xayikko, intte intte nagaran haiqqana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said they unto him, Who art thou? And Jesus saith unto them, Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti, "Neeni oonee?" yaagidi oichchidosona. Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani intteyyo kaseesappe yootido tana.

English Sentences: I have many things to say and to judge of you: but he that sent me is true; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttebaa haasayiyoobainne pirddiyoobai darobai de7ees. SHin tana kiittidaagee tumanchcha; qassi taani appe siyidoogaa sa7aa asaayyo yootais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba Aawaabaa haasayiyoogaa eti akeekibookkona.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto them, When ye have lifted up the Son of man, then shall ye know that I am he, and that I do nothing of myself; but as my Father hath taught me, I speak these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yesuusi eta, "Tana Asa Na7aa intte masqqaliyaa bolli kaqqiyo wode, taani tana gidiyoogaanne qassi taani ta Aawai tana tamaarissidoogaadan haasayiyoogaappe attin, ta shenen ainne oottennaagaa intte erana.

English Sentences: And he that sent me is with me: the Father hath not left me alone; for I do always those things that please him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi tana kiittidaagee tanaara de7ees; taani ubba wode a ufaissiyaagaa oottiyo gishshau, i ta xalaalaa aggibeenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: As he spake these words, many believed on him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa haasayishin siyida daro asai a ammaniis.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him, If ye continue in my word, then are ye my disciples indeed;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi bana ammanida Aihudata, "Intte taani tamaarissiyoogau azazettikko, tumu tana kaalliyaageeta.

English Sentences: And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte tumatettaakka erana; qassi tumatettai inttena ailletettaappe kessana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They answered him, We be Abraham's seed, and were never in bondage to any man: how sayest thou, Ye shall be made free?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaaridi, "Nuuni Abrahaama zare; nuuni ooyyookka ailletibookko. Yaatin neeni woigada, Ailletettaappe intte kiyana gai?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; nagara oottiya ooninne nagara aille.

English Sentences: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever: but the Son abideth ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aillee ubba wode sooni de7enna; shin na7i merinau sooni de7ees.

English Sentences: If the Son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7ai inttena ailletettaappe kessikko, intte ailletettaappe intte tumu kiyana.

English Sentences: I know that ye are Abraham's seed; but ye seek to kill me, because my word hath no place in you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Abrahaama zare gidiyoogaa taani erais; shin ta qaalai intte wozanan bainna gishshau, tana woranau koyeeta.

English Sentences: I speak that which I have seen with my Father: and ye do that which ye have seen with your father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta Aawai tana bessidoogaa haasayais; qassi inttekka intte aawaappe siyidoogaa ootteeta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They answered and said unto him, Abraham is our father. Jesus saith unto them, If ye were Abraham's children, ye would do the works of Abraham.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaaridi, "Nu aawai Abrahaama" yaagidosona. Yaagin Yesuusi eta, "Intte Abrahaama naata gididaakko, i oottido oosuwaa malaa oottana.

English Sentences: But now ye seek to kill me, a man that hath told you the truth, which I have heard of God: this did not Abraham.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossaappe siyido tumaa yootida tana intte woranau koyeeta; Abrahaami hegaadan oottibeenna.

English Sentences: Ye do the deeds of your father. Then said they to him, We be not born of fornication; we have one Father, even God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte intte aawai oottidoogaa ootteeta" yaagiis. Eti zaaridi, "Nuuni shaaramuxan yelettibookko; nuuyyo issi Aawai, Xoossaa xalaalai de7ees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus said unto them, If God were your Father, ye would love me: for I proceeded forth and came from God; neither came I of myself, but he sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta, "Intte Xoossaa naata tumu gididaakko, tana siiqana; aissi giikko, taani Xoossaa matappe yaada hagan de7ais. Tana i kiittidoogaappe attin, taani ta shenen yabeikke.

English Sentences: Why do ye not understand my speech? even because ye cannot hear my word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani giyoogaa intte akeekennaagee aibissee? Taani giyoogaa intte siyanau danddayenna gishshassa.

English Sentences: Ye are of your father the devil, and the lusts of your father ye will do. He was a murderer from the beginning, and abode not in the truth, because there is no truth in him. When he speaketh a lie, he speaketh of his own: for he is a liar, and the father of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte intte aawaa xalahe halaqaa naata; qassi intte intte aawai amottiyoobaa oottanau koyeeta. I kaseppe doommidi, shemppo woridaagaa; tumatetti aani bainna gishshau, tumatettaakko shiiqi erenna. I wordduwaa haasayiyo wode, baappe haasayees; aissi giikko, i worddanchchanne qassi wordduwaukka aawa.

English Sentences: And because I tell you the truth, ye believe me not.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani tumaa haasayiyo gishshau, intte tana ammanekketa.

English Sentences: Which of you convinceth me of sin? And if I say the truth, why do ye not believe me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteppe tana nagara oottishin be7aas gaanau danddayiyai oonee? Taani tumaa haasayiyaabaa gidikko, tana aissi ammanekketii?

English Sentences: He that is of God heareth God's words: ye therefore hear them not, because ye are not of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa asa gidiya urai Xoossai giyoogaa ezggees; intte Xoossaa asa gidenna gishshau, Xoossai giyoogaa ezggekketa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then answered the Jews, and said unto him, Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan, and hast a devil?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati zaaridi, "Nuuni nena, Neeni Samaariyaa asa; nenan xalahee de7ees giidi mooridoo?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered, I have not a devil; but I honour my Father, and ye do dishonour me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Ta bolli xalahee baawa. Taani ta Aawaa bonchchais; shin intte tana kaushsheeta.

English Sentences: And I seek not mine own glory: there is one that seeketh and judgeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta huuphessi bonchcho koyikke; hegaa koyiyaageenne pirddiyaagee de7ees.

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto you, If a man keep my saying, he shall never see death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; ta qaalaa naagiya ooninne mulekka haiqqenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said the Jews unto him, Now we know that thou hast a devil. Abraham is dead, and the prophets; and thou sayest, If a man keep my saying, he shall never taste of death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati zaaridi, "Ne bolli xalahee de7iyoogaa nuuni ha77i erida. Abrahaami haiqqiis; hananabaa yootiyaageetikka haiqqidosona; shin neeni, Ta qaalaa naagiya ooninne mulekka haiqqenna yaagaasa.

English Sentences: Art thou greater than our father Abraham, which is dead? and the prophets are dead: whom makest thou thyself?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni haiqqida nu aawaa Abrahaamappe darai? Hananabaa yootiyaageetikka qassi haiqqidosona. Neeni nena o mala gaada qoppai?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered, If I honour myself, my honour is nothing: it is my Father that honoureth me; of whom ye say, that he is your God:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Taani tana bonchchikko, ta bonchchoi hada; intte nu Xoossaa giyo ta Aawai tana bonchchees.

English Sentences: Yet ye have not known him; but I know him: and if I should say, I know him not, I shall be a liar like unto you: but I know him, and keep his saying.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte a erana xayikkokka, taani a erais. Taani a erikke giikko, inttenadan worddanchcha gidais; shin taani a erais; qassi a qaalaakka naagais.

English Sentences: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day: and he saw it, and was glad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte aawai Abrahaami, ta gallassaa be7anau laamotiis; be7idikka ufaittiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said the Jews unto him, Thou art not yet fifty years old, and hast thou seen Abraham?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati zaaridi a, "Neeyyo harai atto ishatamu laitta kumibeennaagee Abrahaama be7adii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Before Abraham was, I am.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; Abrahaami yelettanaappekka kase taani de7ais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then took they up stones to cast at him: but Jesus hid himself, and went out of the temple, going through the midst of them, and so passed by.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eti Yesuusa caddanau shuchchaa ekkidosona; shin Yesuusi etappe geemettidi, Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kiyidi biis.

English Sentences: And as Jesus passed by, he saw a man which was blind from his birth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi biiddi, yelettoosappe qooqe gididi de7iya issi bitaniyaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And his disciples asked him, saying, Master, who did sin, this man, or his parents, that he was born blind?
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, ha bitanee qooqe gididi yelettanaadan, nagara oottidai oonee? I oottideeyye? Woi a yelidaageeti oottidonaa?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered, Neither hath this man sinned, nor his parents: but that the works of God should be made manifest in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi, "Xoossaa oosoi a bollan qonccana mala qooqidoogaappe attin, i woi a aayyiyaanne a aawai nagara oottibookkona.

English Sentences: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni sa7ai qammennan de7ishin, tana kiittidaagaa oosuwaa oottanau bessees. Ooninne oottanau danddayenna qammai yees.

English Sentences: As long as I am in the world, I am the light of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani sa7an de7aidda sa7au poo7o" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When he had thus spoken, he spat on the ground, and made clay of the spittle, and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa giidi, sa7an cuchchiis; ba cuchchan guutta urqqaa shugissidi, he urqqan qooqe bitaniyaa aifiyaa tiyiis.

English Sentences: And said unto him, Go, wash in the pool of Siloam, (which is by interpretation, Sent.) He went his way therefore, and washed, and came seeing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tiyidi, "Baada Saliihooma giyo dagattida haattan ne aifiyaa meecca" yaagiis. "Saliihooma" giyoogee "Kiitettidaagaa" giyoogaa. Hegaa gishshau, bitanee biidi, ba aifiyaa meecettidi, xeelliiddi simmiis.

English Sentences: The neighbours therefore, and they which before had seen him that he was blind, said, Is not this he that sat and begged?
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitaniyaa shoorotinne bitanee kase woossishin be7ida asainne, "Hagee uttidi woossiya bitaniyaa gidenneeyye?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Some said, This is he: others said, He is like him: but he said, I am he.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi amaridaageeti, "Hagee attennee" yaagidosona. Harati qassi, "CHii, hagee a milatiyoogaappe attin, a gidenna" yaagidosona. SHin bitanee, "Taani attennee" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore said they unto him, How were thine eyes opened?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti bitaniyaa, "Yaatin, ne aifee waani xeellidee?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: He answered and said, A man that is called Jesus made clay, and anointed mine eyes, and said unto me, Go to the pool of Siloam, and wash: and I went and washed, and I received sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: I zaaridi, "Yesuusa giyo asi guutta urqqaa shugissidi, ta aifiyaa tiyiis. Tiyidi, Saliihooma giyo dagattida haattan baada ne aifiyaa meecetta yaagiis. Taani baada meecettada xeellaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said they unto him, Where is he? He said, I know not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a, "I awan de7ii?" yaagidi oichchidosona. Oichchin bitanee, "Taani erikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti kase qooqidi xeellida bitaniyaa Parisaawetukko ekki efiidosona.

English Sentences: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay, and opened his eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi urqqaa shugissidi, bitaniyaa aifiyaa pattido gallassai Sambbata gallassa.

English Sentences: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight. He said unto them, He put clay upon mine eyes, and I washed, and do see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, bitanee waani xeellidaakkonne Parisaaweti a naa77anttuwaa oichchidosona. Oichchin bitanee etau, "I ta aifiyan guutta urqqaa wottiis. Ta aifiyaa meecettaas; meecettada ha77i xeellais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore said some of the Pharisees, This man is not of God, because he keepeth not the sabbath day. Others said, How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles? And there was a division among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaawetuppe issooti issooti, "Hagaa oottida bitanee Sambbata higgiyaa naagenna gishshau, Xoossaa matappe yibeenna" yaagidosona. SHin harati, "Nagaranchcha asi hagaa mala wolqqaama malaataa waani oottanau danddayii?" yaagidosona; yaagidi eti bantta giddon shaahettidosona.

English Sentences: They say unto the blind man again, What sayest thou of him, that he hath opened thine eyes? He said, He is a prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Parisaaweti bitaniyaa, "I ne aifiyaa dooyido gishshau, abaa woigai?" yaagidosona. Yaagin bitanee, "I hananabaa yootiyaagaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But the Jews did not believe concerning him, that he had been blind, and received his sight, until they called the parents of him that had received his sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati he xeellida bitaniyaa aayyiyoonne aawaa xeesidi oichchana gakkanaassi, bitanee qooqe gididoogaanne ha77i i xeelliyoogaa ammanibookkona.

English Sentences: And they asked them, saying, Is this your son, who ye say was born blind? how then doth he now see?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati a aayyiyoonne aawaa, "Intte, Qooqe gididi yelettiis giyo intte na7ai hagee? Yaatin, ha77i waanidi xeellidee?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: His parents answered them and said, We know that this is our son, and that he was born blind:
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin bitaniyaa aayyiyaanne aawai, "Hagee nu na7aa gididoogaanne qooqe i gididi yelettidoogaa nuuni eroos.

English Sentences: But by what means he now seeth, we know not; or who hath opened his eyes, we know not: he is of age; ask him: he shall speak for himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha77i i waani xeellidaakko, nuuni erokko; woi a aifiyaa ooni pattidaakko, nuuni erokko. A oichchite; i gastta asa; babaa haasayanau danddayees!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: These words spake his parents, because they feared the Jews: for the Jews had agreed already, that if any man did confess that he was Christ, he should be put out of the synagogue.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitaniyaa aayyiyaanne aawai Aihudatuyyo yayyido gishshau, hegaa giidosona; aissi giikko, Aihudati Yesuusi Kiristtoosa yaagidi markkattiya urai de7ikko, he uraa Aihuda woosa keettaappe kessanau kasetidi qachchi wottidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore said his parents, He is of age; ask him.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aayyiyaanne aawai, "I gastta asa; a oichchite!" giidoogee hegaassa.

English Sentences: Then again called they the man that was blind, and said unto him, Give God the praise: we know that this man is a sinner.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, qooqe gididi yelettida bitaniyaa eti naa77anttuwaa xeesidi, "Xoossaa galata; ha bitanee nagaranchcha gidiyoogaa nuuni eroos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He answered and said, Whether he be a sinner or no, I know not: one thing I know, that, whereas I was blind, now I see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin bitanee, "I nagaranchcha gidin, gidana xayin erikke; taani qooqe gidiyoogaanne ha77i xeelliyoogaa he issibaa erais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said they to him again, What did he to thee? how opened he thine eyes?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaaridi bitaniyaa, "I neeyyo ai oottidee? I ne aifiyaa waati pattidee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He answered them, I have told you already, and ye did not hear: wherefore would ye hear it again? will ye also be his disciples?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin i eta, "Taani intteyyo yootarggaas; siyibeekketa. Aissi naa77anttuwaa siyanau koyeetii? Inttekka Yesuusa kaalliyaageeta gidanau koyeetiiyye?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then they reviled him, and said, Thou art his disciple; but we are Moses' disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a cayidi, "Neeni he bitaniyaa kaalliyaagaa; nuuni Muusa kaalliyaageeta.

English Sentences: We know that God spake unto Moses: as for this fellow, we know not from whence he is.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Muuseyyo haasayidoogaa nuuni eroos; shin ha bitaniyaa gidikko, i awappe yiidaakkonne nuuni erokko" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: The man answered and said unto them, Why herein is a marvellous thing, that ye know not from whence he is, and yet he hath opened mine eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin bitanee, "I awappe yiidaakkonne intte erennaagee garamissiyaabaa; shin i ta aifiyaa pattiis!

English Sentences: Now we know that God heareth not sinners: but if any man be a worshipper of God, and doeth his will, him he heareth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaayyo yayyiya urainne Xoossai koyiyoobaa oottiya urai de7ikko, he uraabaa Xoossai siyiyoogaappe attin, nagaranchchatubaa siyenna.

English Sentences: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qooqe gididi yelettida asa aifiyaa ooninne pattin, sa7ai merettoosappe doommin, siyetti erenna.

English Sentences: If this man were not of God, he could do nothing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha bitanee Xoossaappe yibeennabaa gidiyaakko, issibaanne oottanaukka danddayenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They answered and said unto him, Thou wast altogether born in sins, and dost thou teach us? And they cast him out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaaridi ayyo, "Neeni nagaran yelettada diccidaagee nuna tamaarissanau koyai?" yaagidosona; Aihuda woosa keettaappe a kare kessidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus heard that they had cast him out; and when he had found him, he said unto him, Dost thou believe on the Son of God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bitaniyaa kare kessidoogaa Yesuusi siyiis; Yesuusi bitaniyaa demmidi, "Asa Na7aa ammanai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: He answered and said, Who is he, Lord, that I might believe on him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee Yesuusa, "Godau, taani a ammananaadan i oonee? Taayyo odarkkii!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto him, Thou hast both seen him, and it is he that talketh with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi bitaniyaa, "Neeni a be7adasa; ha nenaara haasayiyaageekka a" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Lord, I believe. And he worshipped him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee zaaridi, "Godau, ammanais" yaagidi Yesuusayyo goinniis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said, For judgment I am come into this world, that they which see not might see; and that they which see might be made blind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Qooqeti xeellana malanne xeelliyaageeti qooqana mala, taani pirddanau ha sa7aa yaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words, and said unto him, Are we blind also?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aara de7iya amarida Parisaaweti hegaa siyidi, "Nuunikka qooqeeyye?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus said unto them, If ye were blind, ye should have no sin: but now ye say, We see; therefore your sin remaineth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi, "Intte qooqe gididaakko, intteyyo nagara gidenna; shin ha77i intte, Nuuni xeelloos yaageeta; intte nagaraara de7eeta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold, but climbeth up some other way, the same is a thief and a robber.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; dorssaa birddiyau penggeera gelennan harasaara geliya ooninne kaisonne pangga.

English Sentences: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin penggeera geliyaagee dorssaa heemmiya asa.

English Sentences: To him the porter openeth; and the sheep hear his voice: and he calleth his own sheep by name, and leadeth them out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Penggiyaa naagiyaagee au penggiyaa dooyees; dorssatikka a qaalaa siyana; i ba dorssata eta sunttan sunttan xeesidi, kare kaalettana.

English Sentences: And when he putteth forth his own sheep, he goeth before them, and the sheep follow him: for they know his voice.
Wolaitta Sentences: I baageeta kare kessidoogaappe guyyiyan, etappe sinttaara hemettees; etikka a qaalaa eriyo gishshau, a kaalloosona.

English Sentences: And a stranger will they not follow, but will flee from him: for they know not the voice of strangers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara uraa qaalaa eti erenna gishshau, appe baqatanaappe attin, a geeduwaa kaallokkona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: This parable spake Jesus unto them: but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etau ha leemisuwaa odiis; shin i etau ai odiyaakkonne eti akeekibookkona.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto them again, Verily, verily, I say unto you, I am the door of the sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qassikka etau, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; taani dorssatuyyo pengge.

English Sentences: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers: but the sheep did not hear them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taappe kase yiida ubbai kaisonne pangga; shin dorssati eti giyoogaa siyibookkona.

English Sentences: I am the door: by me if any man enter in, he shall be saved, and shall go in and out, and find pasture.
Wolaitta Sentences: Penggee tana; tanan geliya ooninne attana. I gelananne kiyana; qassi lo77o maatai de7iyoosaakka demmana.

English Sentences: The thief cometh not, but for to steal, and to kill, and to destroy: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaisoi wuuqqanau, woranaunne xaissanau yiyoogaappe attin, harabau yeenna; taani etau de7oi de7ana malanne kumidi palahana mala yaas.

English Sentences: I am the good shepherd: the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani dorssaa loitta heemmiyaagaa; dorssaa loitti heemmiyaagee he dorssatu gishshau haiqqees.

English Sentences: But he that is an hireling, and not the shepherd, whose own the sheep are not, seeth the wolf coming, and leaveth the sheep, and fleeth: and the wolf catcheth them, and scattereth the sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Miishshaa ekkidi heemmiya urai wanggireelloi yiishin be7idi, dorssata yeggi bayidi baqatees. Aissi giikko, dorssati aageeta gidokkona; qassi ikka dorssata heemmiyaagaa gidenna. Hegaa gishshau, wanggireelloi dorssata oiqqeesinne laalees.

English Sentences: The hireling fleeth, because he is an hireling, and careth not for the sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Miishshaa ekkidi heemmiyaagee miishshau heemmiyo gishshaunne dorssaabai a qofissenna gishshau, dorssata aggi bayidi baqatees.

English Sentences: I am the good shepherd, and know my sheep, and am known of mine.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani dorssaa loitta heemmiyaagaa; ta Aawai tana eriyoogaadan, taanikka qassi ta Aawaa erais.

English Sentences: As the Father knoweth me, even so know I the Father: and I lay down my life for the sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, taani ta dorssata erais; ta dorssatikka tana eroosona. Qassi taani ta dorssatu gishshau, haiqqanau koyais.

English Sentences: And other sheep I have, which are not of this fold: them also I must bring, and they shall hear my voice; and there shall be one fold, and one shepherd.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha wudiyan bainna hara dorssatikka tau de7oosona. Taani etakka ehaanau bessees. Qassi eti ta qaalaa siyana; issi wudee de7ana; heemmiyaageekka issuwaa gidana.

English Sentences: Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani ta shemppuwaa zaarettada ekkana mala, aattada immanau koyiyo gishshau, ta Aawai tana siiqees.

English Sentences: No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. This commandment have I received of my Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani dosada ta shemppuwaa aatta immiyoogaappe attin, taappe ooninne ekkenna. Taayyo ta shemppuwaa aatta immiyo maatai de7ees; qassi zaarettada ekkanaukka maatai de7ees. Taani ha azazuwaa ta Aawaappe ekkaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings.
Wolaitta Sentences: He haasayaa gishshau, Aihudatu giddon qassikka shaahoi merettiis.

English Sentences: And many of them said, He hath a devil, and is mad; why hear ye him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe dariya baggai, "Aani xalahee de7ees! I gooyees! A haasayaa aissi siyeetii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Others said, These are not the words of him that hath a devil. Can a devil open the eyes of the blind?
Wolaitta Sentences: Harati qassi, "Xalahee oiqqido asi hagaadan haasayenna; xalahee qooqe asa aife xeelissanau danddayiiyye?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication, and it was winter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaamen Beeta Maqidasiyaa Ooraxissiyo Baalai gakkiis; sa7ai he wode balggo.

English Sentences: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon's porch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan Solomona baranddan, yaanne haanne hamettees.

English Sentences: Then came the Jews round about him, and said unto him, How long dost thou make us to doubt? If thou be the Christ, tell us plainly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati Yesuusa matan yuuyi aadhdhidi, "Neeni nuna aude gakkanaassi sirissaidda wottuutee? Neeni Kiristtoosa gidikko, nuuyyo geeshshada oda" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered them, I told you, and ye believed not: the works that I do in my Father's name, they bear witness of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etayyo zaaridi, "Taani intteyyo yootaas; shin tana ammanekketa; taani ta Aawaa sunttan oottiyo oosoi tabaa markkattees.

English Sentences: But ye believe not, because ye are not of my sheep, as I said unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani intteyyo odidoogaadan, intte ta dorssa gidenna gishshau ammanekketa.

English Sentences: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta dorssati ta qaalaa siyoosona; taani eta erais; etikka tana kaalloosona.

English Sentences: And I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani etayyo merinaa de7uwaa immais; qassi eti mulekka haiqqokkona. Ooninne ta kushiyaappe eta wotti ekkanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta taayyo immida ta Aawai ooppenne aadhdhees; ooninne ta Aawaa kushiyaappe eta wotti ekkanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: I and my Father are one.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taanne ta Aawai issuwaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati Yesuusa caddanau qassikka shuchchaa denttidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered them, Many good works have I shewed you from my Father; for which of those works do ye stone me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Taani oottanau ta Aawai taayyo immido daro lo77o oosuwaa inttena bessaas; hegeetuppe augeetu gishshau, tana shuchchan caddanau koyeetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The Jews answered him, saying, For a good work we stone thee not; but for blasphemy; and because that thou, being a man, makest thyself God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati zaaridi, "Nuuni nena lo77o ooso gishshau, shuchchan caddanau koyokko; shin neeni Xoossaa cayiyo gishshaunne qassi asa gidaidda ne huuphiyaa Xoossaa oottido gishshau, caddanau koyoos!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered them, Is it not written in your law, I said, Ye are gods?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Intte higgiyan Xoossai, Intte xoossata giidoogee xaafettibeennee?

English Sentences: If he called them gods, unto whom the word of God came, and the scripture cannot be broken;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa maxaafata laammanau danddayettenna; Xoossai ba qaalai yiido asata, xoossata giidi xeesidobaa gidikko,

English Sentences: Say ye of him, whom the Father hath sanctified, and sent into the world, Thou blasphemest; because I said, I am the Son of God?
Wolaitta Sentences: taani, Taani Xoossaa Na7aa giido gishshau, ta Aawai anjjidi, sa7aa kiittido tana, Xoossaa cayaasa yaageetii?

English Sentences: If I do not the works of my Father, believe me not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta Aawai oottiyoogaa oottana xayikko, tana ammanoppite.

English Sentences: But if I do, though ye believe not me, believe the works: that ye may know, and believe, that the Father is in me, and I in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani oottiyaabaa gidikko, harai atto intte tana ammanana xayikkokka, ta Aawai tanan de7iyoogaanne taanikka ta Aawan de7iyoogaa eranaadaaninne akeekanaadan, ta oosuwaa ammanite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore they sought again to take him: but he escaped out of their hand,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka eti a oiqqanau koyidosona; shin i etappe baqatiis.

English Sentences: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized; and there he abode.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi kase xammaqiyoosaa Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefintti Yesuusi pinnidi, yaani de7iis.

English Sentences: And many resorted unto him, and said, John did no miracle: but all things that John spake of this man were true.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai Yesuusakko yiidi, "Yohaannisi wolqqaama malaata oottibeenna; shin i ha bitaniyaabaa haasayidobai ubbai tuma" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And many believed on him there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaani daro asai Yesuusa ammaniis.

English Sentences: Now a certain man was sick, named Lazarus, of Bethany, the town of Mary and her sister Martha.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biitaaniyaa giyo qeeri kataman Al77aazara giyo issi bitanee harggiis; he katamai Mairaamanne i michchiyaa Martta de7ido katamaa.

English Sentences: (It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment, and wiped his feet with her hair, whose brother Lazarus was sick.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa tohuwaa shittuwaa tiyada, ba binnaanan a tohuwaa quccidaara he Mairaamo; harggidaagee qassi i ishaa Al77aazara.

English Sentences: Therefore his sisters sent unto him, saying, Lord, behold, he whom thou lovest is sick.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, michchentti, "Godau, neeni siiqiyoogee harggiis" giidi Yesuusayyo kiittidosona.

English Sentences: When Jesus heard that, he said, This sickness is not unto death, but for the glory of God, that the Son of God might be glorified thereby.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa siyido wode, "Taani Xoossaa Na7ai harggiyaa gaasuwan bonchchettana mala, Xoossaa bonchchuwaassi ha harggee Al77aazara oiqqidoogaappe attin, woriya hargge gidenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now Jesus loved Martha, and her sister, and Lazarus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Martto, i michchiyoonne Al77aazara siiqees;

English Sentences: When he had heard therefore that he was sick, he abode two days still in the same place where he was.
Wolaitta Sentences: Al77aazari harggidoogaa Yesuusi siyido wode, ba de7iyoosan naa77u gallassaa pe7iis.

English Sentences: Then after that saith he to his disciples, Let us go into Judaea again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata, "Naa77anttuwaa Yihudaa biitti boos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: His disciples say unto him, Master, the Jews of late sought to stone thee; and goest thou thither again?
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, guutta wodeppe kase Aihudati nena shuchchan caddanau koyidosona; qassikka yaa buutee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered, Are there not twelve hours in the day? If any man walk in the day, he stumbleth not, because he seeth the light of this world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Issi gallassan tammanne naa77u saatee de7ees; de7enneeyye? Gallassi hemettiya asi xubettenna; aissi giikko, i ha sa7aa poo7uwaa be7ees.

English Sentences: But if a man walk in the night, he stumbleth, because there is no light in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qammi hemettiya urai de7ikko, poo7oi aani bainna gishshau, xubettees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: These things said he: and after that he saith unto them, Our friend Lazarus sleepeth; but I go, that I may awake him out of sleep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan, qassikka etau, "Nu dabboi Al77aazari xiskkiis; shin xiskkuwaappe a denttanau taani bais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said his disciples, Lord, if he sleep, he shall do well.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi, "Godau, i xiskkidabaa gidikko, denddana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death: but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Al77aazari haiqqidoogaa Yesuusi odiis; shin Al77aazari xiskkidi zin77idoogaa odiis giidi, eti qoppidosona.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto them plainly, Lazarus is dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yesuusi geeshshidi eta, "Al77aazari haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there, to the intent ye may believe; nevertheless let us go unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ammanana mala, taani he sohuwan de7ennaagaayyo, intte gishshau ufaittais. SHin hinddite; akko boos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Thomas, which is called Didymus, unto his fellowdisciples, Let us also go, that we may die with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Menttiyaa giyo Toomaasi ba lagge erissiyo ashkkarata, "Aara haiqqanau nuunikka qassi boos!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then when Jesus came, he found that he had lain in the grave four days already.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi gakkiyo wode, Al77aazari moogettoosappe oiddu gallassa gidiis.

English Sentences: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem, about fifteen furlongs off:
Wolaitta Sentences: Biitaanee Yerusalaameppe naa77u kilo meetire keenaa haakkees.

English Sentences: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary, to comfort them concerning their brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro Aihudati Marttonne Mairaamo eta ishai haiqqidoogau minttettanau yiidosona.

English Sentences: Then Martha, as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming, went and met him: but Mary sat still in the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Martta Yesuusi yiidoogaa siyada, a mokkanau kiyaasu; shin Mairaama sooni attaasu.

English Sentences: Then said Martha unto Jesus, Lord, if thou hadst been here, my brother had not died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Martta Yesuusa, "Godau, neeni hagan de7idabaa gidiyaakko, ta ishai haiqqenna.

English Sentences: But I know, that even now, whatsoever thou wilt ask of God, God will give it thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin neeni woossiyoobaa ai gidikkokka, Xoossai neeyyo harai atto ha77ikka immanaagaa taani erais" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto her, Thy brother shall rise again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Ne ishai haiquwaappe denddana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Martha saith unto him, I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Martta, "Wurssettaa gallassi haiquwaappe denddanaagaa taani erais" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Jesus said unto her, I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi iyyo, "Taani denddonne de7o; tana ammaniya urai harai atto, haiqqikkokka paxa de7ana.

English Sentences: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die. Believest thou this?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi paxa de7iya urainne tana ammaniya urai ubbai mulekka haiqqenna; hegaa neeni ammanai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: She saith unto him, Yea, Lord: I believe that thou art the Christ, the Son of God, which should come into the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Martta zaarada, "Godau, ee taani ammanais; neeni Xoossaa Na7aa, sa7aa yaanau de7iya Kiristtoosa gidiyoogaa taani ammanais" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And when she had so said, she went her way, and called Mary her sister secretly, saying, The Master is come, and calleth for thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Martta hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan, baada ba michcheeyyo geeman xeesada, "Tamaarissiyaagee yiidi, nena koyees" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: As soon as she heard that, she arose quickly, and came unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mairaama hegaa siyido wode, eesuwan dendda eqqada Yesuusakko baasu.

English Sentences: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town, but was in that place where Martha met him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Martta a mokkidosan de7eesippe attin, biron qeeri katamaa gakkiichchibeenna.

English Sentences: The Jews then which were with her in the house, and comforted her, when they saw Mary, that she rose up hastily and went out, followed her, saying, She goeth unto the grave to weep there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mairaamo minttettiiddi, sooni iira de7iya Aihudati, a eesuwan dendda eqqada kare kiyiyoogaa be7idi, Al77aazari moogettido gonggoluwaa baada yaani yeekkanau hanausu yaagidi, o kaallidi kiyidosona.

English Sentences: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was, and saw him, she fell down at his feet, saying unto him, Lord, if thou hadst been here, my brother had not died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mairaama Yesuusi de7iyoosaa baada Yesuusa be7ido wode, a tohuwaa bollan kunddaasu; kunddada, "Godau, neeni hagan de7idobaa gidiyaakko, ta ishai haiqqenna shin!" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping, and the Jews also weeping which came with her, he groaned in the spirit, and was troubled,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi a yeekkiyoogaanne qassi iira yiida Aihudatikka yeekkiyoogaa be7idi, ba wozanan daro mishettiis; qassi tookki shemppiis.

English Sentences: And said, Where have ye laid him? They said unto him, Lord, come and see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta, "Awan moogidetii?" yaagidi oichchin, "Godau, yaada be7a" yaagidi zaaridosona.

English Sentences: Jesus wept.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi afuxxiis.

English Sentences: Then said the Jews, Behold how he loved him!
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Aihudati, "Al77aazara i ai keenaa siiqiyaakko be7ite!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And some of them said, Could not this man, which opened the eyes of the blind, have caused that even this man should not have died?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin etappe issooti issooti, "Hagee qooqe bitaniyaa xeelissidaagee ha bitanee haiqqenna mala teqqanau danddayennee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave. It was a cave, and a stone lay upon it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qassikka wozanappe qarettidi, Al77aazari moogettido gonggoluwaakko biis; he gonggoloi shuchchan qum77etti uttiis.

English Sentences: Jesus said, Take ye away the stone. Martha, the sister of him that was dead, saith unto him, Lord, by this time he stinketh: for he hath been dead four days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "SHuchchaa pogite!" yaagidi azaziis. Haiqqida bitaniyaa michchiyaa Martta, "Godau, i haiqqoosappe oiddu gallassa gidido gishshau, ha77i xinqqana!" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto her, Said I not unto thee, that, if thou wouldest believe, thou shouldest see the glory of God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Martto, "Ammaniyaabaa gidikko, neeni Xoossaa bonchchuwaa be7anaagaa taani neeyyo yootabeikkinaa?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid. And Jesus lifted up his eyes, and said, Father, I thank thee that thou hast heard me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti shuchchaa denttidosona; denttin Yesuusi saluwaa pude xeellidi, "Aawau, taani giyoogaa neeni siyido gishshau, nena galatais.

English Sentences: And I knew that thou hearest me always: but because of the people which stand by I said it, that they may believe that thou hast sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ubba wode siyiyoogaa taani erais; shin hagan yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqida asai neeni tana kiittidoogaa ammanana mala, hagaa taani eta gishshau gais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he thus had spoken, he cried with a loud voice, Lazarus, come forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Al77aazaraa, haa kiya!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he that was dead came forth, bound hand and foot with graveclothes: and his face was bound about with a napkin. Jesus saith unto them, Loose him, and let him go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqqida bitaniyau kusheenne tohoi shaluwan qashetti uttidaashiininne a som77oikka afalan kametti uttidaashin kiyiis. Kiyin Yesuusi eta, "Birshshidi aggi bayite! Bo!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary, and had seen the things which Jesus did, believed on him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Mairaamikko yiida Aihudatuppe daroti Yesuusi oottidoogaa be7idi, a ammanidosona.

English Sentences: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees, and told them what things Jesus had done.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin etappe issooti issooti Parisaawetukko biidi, Yesuusi oottidoogaa etau odidosona.

English Sentences: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council, and said, What do we? for this man doeth many miracles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, qeese halaqatinne Parisaaweti yaa7aa shiishshidi, "Ha bitanee daro wolqqaama malaataa oottiyo gishshau, ai oottanee?

English Sentences: If we let him thus alone, all men will believe on him: and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni a co77u giidi, aggi bayikko, asai ubbai a ammanana; qassi Roome biittaa asati yiidi, nu Beeta Maqidasiyaanne nu asaa xaissana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And one of them, named Caiaphas, being the high priest that same year, said unto them, Ye know nothing at all,
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issoi Qayaafa giyoogee, he laitti qeese ubbatu halaqa gididaagee, "Intte ainne erekketa!

English Sentences: Nor consider that it is expedient for us, that one man should die for the people, and that the whole nation perish not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai xayiyoogaappe asa ubbaa gishshau, issi asi haiqqiyoogee keha gidiyoogaa intte akeekite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And this spake he not of himself: but being high priest that year, he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation;
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegaa baappe gibeenna; shin he laitti qeese ubbatu halaqa gidiyo gishshau, Yesuusi Aihuda asaa gishshau haiqqanau bessiyoogaa hananabaa yootiis.

English Sentences: And not for that nation only, but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yesuusi Aihuda asaa xalaalaayyo haiqqenna; shin laaletti de7iya Xoossaa naata issippe shiishshanau haiqqana.

English Sentences: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassappe doommidi, eti a woranau maqettidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness, into a city called Ephraim, and there continued with his disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yesuusi Aihudatu giddon qoncciyan yaa haa hemettibeenna; shin bazzuwaa lanqqiyan de7iya biitti, Efireema giyo qeeri katamaa biis. Biidi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura he sohuwan takkiis.

English Sentences: And the Jews' passover was nigh at hand: and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover, to purify themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassai matiis; qassi daro asai bana geeshshanau, Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassai gakkanaappe kase he biittaappe Yerusalaame biis.

English Sentences: Then sought they for Jesus, and spake among themselves, as they stood in the temple, What think ye, that he will not come to the feast?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yesuusa koyoosona; Beeta Maqidasiyan eqqidi, "Ai qoppeetii? Paasikaa bonchchiyoosaa Yesuusi yeennee?" yaagidi issoi issuwaa oichchidosona.

English Sentences: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment, that, if any man knew where he were, he should shew it, that they might take him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi qeesetu halaqatinne Parisaaweti Yesuusa qachchanau, i de7iyoosaa eriya ooninne banttayyo yootana mala azazidosona.

English Sentences: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany, where Lazarus was, which had been dead, whom he raised from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassaappe usuppun gallassaa kasetidi, Yesuusi i haiquwaappe denttido Al77aazari de7iyo Biitaaniyaa giyo katamaa biis.

English Sentences: There they made him a supper; and Martha served: but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwan eti au kahuwaa kattidosona; Al77aazari aara issippe uttidaashin, Martta kahuwaa kattausu.

English Sentences: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard, very costly, and anointed the feet of Jesus, and wiped his feet with her hair: and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mairaama daro miishshan baizettiya narddoose giyo geeshsha shittuwaa ehaada, Yesuusa tohuwaa tiyaasu; tiyada ba binnaanan a tohuwaa quccaasu; keetta ubbai shittuwaa sawuwan tonggu gees.

English Sentences: Then saith one of his disciples, Judas Iscariot, Simon's son, which should betray him,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi, Yesuusa aatti immanaagee, Yihudaa Asqqorootu,

English Sentences: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence, and given to the poor?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha shittoi issi xeetanne ishatamu biran baizettin, aibissi birai hiyyeesau imettennee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: This he said, not that he cared for the poor; but because he was a thief, and had the bag, and bare what was put therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: I kaiso gidido gishshau, hegaa giisippe attin, hiyyeesau qarettidi gibeenna; i miishshaa qarcciitaa oiqqiyaagaa gidiyo gishshau, ubba wode appe baayyo ekkees.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus, Let her alone: against the day of my burying hath she kept this.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Bau de7iyaabaa taani moogettiyo gallassau minjju; o aggite.

English Sentences: For the poor always ye have with you; but me ye have not always.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiyyeesati ubba wode inttenaara de7ana; shin taani ubba wode inttenaara de7ikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there: and they came not for Jesus' sake only, but that they might see Lazarus also, whom he had raised from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudatuppe daro asai Yesuusi Biitaaniyan de7iyoogaa siyidi, yaa biis; eti Yesuusa be7ana gishsha xalaalau gidennan, i haiquwaappe denttido Al77aazarakka be7anau biidosona.

English Sentences: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, qeese halaqati Al77aazarakka qassi woranau maqettidosona.

English Sentences: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away, and believed on Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Al77aazara gaasuwan daro Aihudati banttana kaalettiyaageeta aggi bayidi, Yesuusa ammanoosona.

English Sentences: On the next day much people that were come to the feast, when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem,
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi Paasikaa bonchchiyoosaa yiida daro asai Yesuusi Yerusalaame biyoogaa siyiis.

English Sentences: Took branches of palm trees, and went forth to meet him, and cried, Hosanna: Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyidi zambbaa haittaa oiqqidi, a mokkanau kiyidosona. Bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Xoossai galatetto! Xoossaa sunttan yiya Israa7eela kawoi anjjettidaagaa!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus, when he had found a young ass, sat thereon; as it is written,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa maxaafai, "Xiyoone katamau, yayyoppa!

English Sentences: Fear not, daughter of Sion: behold, thy King cometh, sitting on an ass's colt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7a, ne kawoi hare maraa bolli uttidi yees" giyoogaadan, Yesuusi hare maraa demmidi, a toggiis.

English Sentences: These things understood not his disciples at the first: but when Jesus was glorified, then remembered they that these things were written of him, and that they had done these things unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa kase akeekibookkona; shin Yesuusi bonchchettidoogaappe guyyiyan, Xoossaa maxaafai hegaa ubbaa giidoogaanne qassi etikka hegaa ubbaa Yesuusayyo oottidoogaa hassayidosona.

English Sentences: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave, and raised him from the dead, bare record.
Wolaitta Sentences: Al77aazari moogettido gonggoluwaappe Yesuusi a xeesidi, haiquwaappe denttido wode, Yesuusaara de7iya daro asai Yesuusayyo markkattiis.

English Sentences: For this cause the people also met him, for that they heard that he had done this miracle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai a mokkanau kiyidoogee, i he wolqqaama malaataa oottido gishshassa.

English Sentences: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves, Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing? behold, the world is gone after him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Parisaaweti issoi issuwaa, "Intte ainne oottanau danddayennaagaa be7eetii! Be7ite, dere ubbai a geeduwaa kaallees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast:
Wolaitta Sentences: Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi goinnanau Yerusalaame biidaageetu giddon issi issi Giriike asati de7oosona.

English Sentences: The same came therefore to Philip, which was of Bethsaida of Galilee, and desired him, saying, Sir, we would see Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Galiila biittan Beetasaida giyo katamaappe yiida Piliphphoosakko biidi, "Godau, nuuni Yesuusa be7anau koyoos" yaagidi woossidosona.

English Sentences: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew: and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Piliphphoosi biidi, Inddiraasayyo odiis; odin naa77aikka biidi, Yesuusayyo odidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered them, saying, The hour is come, that the Son of man should be glorified.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etau hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani, Asa Na7ai, bonchchettiyo saatee gakkiis.

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto you, Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die, it abideth alone: but if it die, it bringeth forth much fruit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; issi gistte aifiyaa biittan wodhdhada wooqqana xayikko, barkka attausu. SHin he gisttee aifiyaa wooqqikko, daro aifiyaa aifausu.

English Sentences: He that loveth his life shall lose it; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba shemppuwaa siiqiya ooninne bashshees; qassi ba shemppuwaa ha sa7an ixxiya ooninne merinaa de7uwau ashshees.

English Sentences: If any man serve me, let him follow me; and where I am, there shall also my servant be: if any man serve me, him will my Father honour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne tau oottikko, tana kaallanau bessees; qassi taani de7iyoosan ta ashkkaraikka de7ana. Tau oottiya oonanne, ta Aawaikka a bonchchana.

English Sentences: Now is my soul troubled; and what shall I say? Father, save me from this hour: but for this cause came I unto this hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77i ta shemppoi daro un77ettiis; yaatin woigoo? Taani, Ta Aawau, tana ha saateeppe ashsharkkii yaagoo? CHii, taani ha saatiyan yiidoogee hagaa gishshassa.

English Sentences: Father, glorify thy name. Then came there a voice from heaven, saying, I have both glorified it, and will glorify it again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta Aawau, ne sunttaa bonchcha" yaagiis. He wode saluwaappe, "Taani ta sunttaa bonchchaas; qassikka gujjada bonchchana" yaagiya qaalai yiis.

English Sentences: The people therefore, that stood by, and heard it, said that it thundered: others said, An angel spake to him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwan eqqida daro asai he qaalaa siyidi, "Hegee dadaa" yaagiis. Harati qassi, "Kiitanchchai ayyo haasayiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said, This voice came not because of me, but for your sakes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi eta, "Ha qaalai intte gishshau yiidoogaappe attin, ta gishshassa gidenna.

English Sentences: Now is the judgment of this world: now shall the prince of this world be cast out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sa7ai pirddettiyo wodee ha77a; ha sa7aa haariyaagee ha77i kare olettana.

English Sentences: And I, if I be lifted up from the earth, will draw all men unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani masqqaliyaa bolli kaqettiyo wode, asa ubbaa taakko ekkana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: This he said, signifying what death he should die.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegaa giidoogee ai mala haiquwaa i haiqqanaakkonne eta erissanaassa.

English Sentences: The people answered him, We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever: and how sayest thou, The Son of man must be lifted up? who is this Son of man?
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai zaaridi Yesuusa, "Nu higgee Kiristtoosi merinau de7iyoogaa odees. Yaatin, neeni woigada, Asa Na7ai masqqaliyaa bolli kaqettana gai? He Asa Na7ai oonee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then Jesus said unto them, Yet a little while is the light with you. Walk while ye have the light, lest darkness come upon you: for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Poo7oi inttenaara guutta wodiyaa takkana. Intteyyo xumenna mala, poo7oi de7ishin, poo7uwan hemettite. Xuman hemettiya urai au biyaakkonne erenna.

English Sentences: While ye have light, believe in the light, that ye may be the children of light. These things spake Jesus, and departed, and did hide himself from them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Poo7uwaa asa gidana mala, intteyyo poo7oi de7ishin, poo7uwaa ammanite" yaagiis. Yesuusi hegaa haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan, biidi etappe geemettiis.

English Sentences: But though he had done so many miracles before them, yet they believed not on him:
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegaa keena wolqqaama malaataa eta sinttan oottikkokka, hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi,

English Sentences: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled, which he spake, Lord, who hath believed our report? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Godau, nu markkatettaa ooni ammanidee? Godai ba wolqqaa oona bessidee?" giidoogee tuma gidana mala, eti a ammanibookkona.

English Sentences: Therefore they could not believe, because that Esaias said again,
Wolaitta Sentences: Isiyaasi qassikka, "Eta aifee xeellenna mala, eta wozanaikka akeekenna mala, eti Xoossaakko simmin, i eta pattenna mala, Xoossai eta aifiyaa qooqissiis.

English Sentences: He hath blinded their eyes, and hardened their heart; that they should not see with their eyes, nor understand with their heart, and be converted, and I should heal them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta wozanaa dammissiis" giido gishshau, eti ammananau danddayibookkona.

English Sentences: These things said Esaias, when he saw his glory, and spake of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isiyaasi Yesuusa bonchchuwaa be7ido gishshaunne qassi abaa haasayido gishshau, hegaa giis.

English Sentences: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him, lest they should be put out of the synagogue:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gidinkka, harai atto Aihudatu halaqatuppekka daroti Yesuusa ammanidosona. SHin Parisaaweti banttana Aihudatu woosa keettaappe kessoosona giidi yayyido gishshau, ammanida giidi markkattibookkona.

English Sentences: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti Xoossaa sabaappe aattidi, asa sabaa siiqidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus cried and said, He that believeth on me, believeth not on me, but on him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi yaagiis; "Tana ammaniya ooninne tana kiittidaagaakka ammaniyoogaappe attin, ta xalaalaa ammanenna.

English Sentences: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana be7iya ooninne tana kiittidaagaakka be7ees.

English Sentences: I am come a light into the world, that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana ammaniya ubbai xuman de7enna mala, taani poo7o gidada sa7aa yaas.

English Sentences: And if any man hear my words, and believe not, I judge him not: for I came not to judge the world, but to save the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta qaalaa siyidi azazettenna uraa oonanne taani pirddikke; aissi giikko, taani sa7aa ashshanau yiidoogaappe attin, pirddanau yabeikke.

English Sentences: He that rejecteth me, and receiveth not my words, hath one that judgeth him: the word that I have spoken, the same shall judge him in the last day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana ixxiya oonanne qassi ta qaalaa ekkenna oonanne pirddiyaagee de7ees. Taani yootido qaalai wurssettaa gallassi he uraa pirddana.

English Sentences: For I have not spoken of myself; but the Father which sent me, he gave me a commandment, what I should say, and what I should speak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani hagaa taappe haasayabeikke; shin tana kiittida ta Aawai taani gaanaagaanne haasayanaagaa tana azaziis.

English Sentences: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting: whatsoever I speak therefore, even as the Father said unto me, so I speak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi a azazoi merinaa de7uwaa ehiyoogaa taani erais; hegaa gishshau, taani yootiyoogee ta Aawai tana yoota giidi odidoogaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now before the feast of the passover, when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father, having loved his own which were in the world, he loved them unto the end.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassai gakkanaappe kasetidi, ha sa7aappe shaahettidi, Aawaakko biyo wodee gakkidoogaa Yesuusi eriis; ha sa7an de7iya baageeta ubba wode siiqiis; wurssettai gakkanaassi eta siiqiis.

English Sentences: And supper being ended, the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot, Simon's son, to betray him;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati kahuwaa miishin, Simoona na7aa Yihudaa Asqqorootu Yesuusa aatti immanaadan, xalahe halaqai a qofissi wottiis.

English Sentences: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands, and that he was come from God, and went to God;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba Aawai ubbabaa a kushiyan wottidoogaa, qassi Xoossaa matappe i yiidoogaanne, simmidi akko baanaagaa eriis.

English Sentences: He riseth from supper, and laid aside his garments; and took a towel, and girded himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi miyoosaappe denddi eqqidi, bolla bagga maayuwaa qaari wottidi, pooxaa ba xeessan gixxiis.

English Sentences: After that he poureth water into a bason, and began to wash the disciples' feet, and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, haattaa kuixaaruwan tigidi, ba erissiyo ashkkaratu tohuwaa meecciyoogaanne ba xeessan gixxido pooxan qucciyoogaa doommiis.

English Sentences: Then cometh he to Simon Peter: and Peter saith unto him, Lord, dost thou wash my feet?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Simoon PHeexiroosakko yin PHeexiroosi, "Godau, neeni ta tohuwaa meeccanau hanaiyye?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto him, What I do thou knowest not now; but thou shalt know hereafter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi a, "Taani oottiyoogaa neeni ha77i erakka; shin guyyeppe akeekana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Peter saith unto him, Thou shalt never wash my feet. Jesus answered him, If I wash thee not, thou hast no part with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHeexiroosi, "Neeni ta tohuwaa mulekka meeccakka!" yaagiis. Yesuusi a, "Taani ne tohuwaa meeccana xayikko, neeyyoonne taayyoonne issippetetti baawa" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: Simon Peter saith unto him, Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHeexiroosi Yesuusa, "Godau, yaatikko, ta tohuwaa xalaalaa meeccoppa; ta kushiyaakka ta huuphiyaakka meecca!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus saith to him, He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet, but is clean every whit: and ye are clean, but not all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Bollaa meecettiichchida urai ooninne tohoppe harabaa meecettanau koshshenna; ayyo ubbasaikka geeshsha. Qassi inttekka geeshsha; shin ubbai geeshsha gidekketa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For he knew who should betray him; therefore said he, Ye are not all clean.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Yesuusi bana aatti immana urai oonakkonne erees; i, "Intte ubbai geeshsha gidekketa" giidoogee hegaassa.

English Sentences: So after he had washed their feet, and had taken his garments, and was set down again, he said unto them, Know ye what I have done to you?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta tohuwaa meeccidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi ba maayuwaa maayidi, ba sohuwaa guyye simmidi biidi uttiis; uttidi eta yaagiis; "Taani intteyyo oottidoogaa akeekeetii?

English Sentences: Ye call me Master and Lord: and ye say well; for so I am.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte tana tamaarissiyaagoonne Godau geeta; taani he intte giyoogaa gidiyo gishshau, loittideta.

English Sentences: If I then, your Lord and Master, have washed your feet; ye also ought to wash one another's feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo Godanne inttena tamaarissiyaagaa gidaidda, intte tohuwaa meeccidabaa gidikko, inttekka issoi issuwaa tohuwaa meeccanau bessees.

English Sentences: For I have given you an example, that ye should do as I have done to you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani intteyyo oottidoogaadan, inttekka oottana mala, intteyyo leemiso gidaas.

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; ashkkari ba godaappe aadhdhenna. Qassi kiitettida uraikka bana kiittidaagaappe aadhdhenna.

English Sentences: If ye know these things, happy are ye if ye do them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte hegaa eridi oottiyaabaa gidikko anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: I speak not of you all: I know whom I have chosen: but that the scripture may be fulfilled, He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intte ubbaabaa haasayikke. Taani dooridoogeeta erais; shin Xoossaa maxaafai, Taani barssidoogee ta kushiyaa saxxiis giidoogee tuma gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: Now I tell you before it come, that, when it is come to pass, ye may believe that I am he.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee haniyo wode taani tana gidiyoogaa intte ammanana mala, hegee hananaappe kasetada intteyyo haara odais.

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; taani kiittiyo oonanne mokkiya urai tanakka mokkees; qassi tana mokkiya ooninne tana kiittidaagaa mokkees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When Jesus had thus said, he was troubled in spirit, and testified, and said, Verily, verily, I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan, ba wozanan daro metootiis; metootidi, "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; tana intteppe issoi aatti immana" giidi qoncciyan odiis.

English Sentences: Then the disciples looked one on another, doubting of whom he spake.
Wolaitta Sentences: I obaa haasayiyaakkonne, erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo mulekka erettennan ixxin, issoi issuwaa xeellidosona.

English Sentences: Now there was leaning on Jesus' bosom one of his disciples, whom Jesus loved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi, Yesuusi siiqiyoogee, Yesuusa matan uttiis.

English Sentences: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him, that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Simoon PHeexiroosi he erissiyo ashkkaraa qim77otidi, "I oona giyaakko, ane a oichcha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: He then lying on Jesus' breast saith unto him, Lord, who is it?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, he erissiyo ashkkarai Yesuusa haittaakko shiiqidi, "Godau, i oonee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered, He it is, to whom I shall give a sop, when I have dipped it. And when he had dipped the sop, he gave it to Judas Iscariot, the son of Simon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani oittan cambbaa tushkkada immiyoogee a" yaagiis. Qassi oittaa mentti ekkidi, cambbaa tushkkidi, Simoona na7aa, Yihudaa Asqqorootuyyo immiis.

English Sentences: And after the sop Satan entered into him. Then said Jesus unto him, That thou doest, do quickly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai oittaa menttettaa ekkidoogaappe guyyiyan, Seexaanai sohuwaarakka Yihudan geliis. Yesuusi a, "Neeni oottanaagaa eesuwan ootta!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he sohuwan uttidaageetuppe ooninne Yesuusi hegaa a aissi giidaakkonne eribeenna.

English Sentences: For some of them thought, because Judas had the bag, that Jesus had said unto him, Buy those things that we have need of against the feast; or, that he should give something to the poor.
