Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai miishshaa qarcciitaa oiqqiyo gishshau, erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issooti issooti Yesuusi Yihudaa, "Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassau banttana koshshiyaabaa baada shamma woi hiyyeesau muxuwaataa imma giis" yaagidi qoppidosona.

English Sentences: He then having received the sop went immediately out: and it was night.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai oittaa me7ettaa ekkidi, sohuwaarakka kare kiyiis; he wode sa7ai qamma.

English Sentences: Therefore, when he was gone out, Jesus said, Now is the Son of man glorified, and God is glorified in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai kare kiyidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi yaagiis; "Ha77i taani Asa Na7ai bonchchettaas: Xoossaikka ta baggaara bonchchettiis.

English Sentences: If God be glorified in him, God shall also glorify him in himself, and shall straightway glorify him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ta baggaara, Asa Na7aa baggaara bonchchettikko, i ba huuphen tana Asa Na7aa bonchchana; qassi i tana sohuwaara bonchchana.

English Sentences: Little children, yet a little while I am with you. Ye shall seek me: and as I said unto the Jews, Whither I go, ye cannot come; so now I say to you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta naatoo, taani inttenaara daro wodiyaa gam77ikke. Intte tana koyana; shin taani Aihudata, Taani biyoosaa intte baanau danddayekketa giidoogaadan, intteyyookka ha77i odais.

English Sentences: A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena ooratta azazuwaa azazais; issoi issuwaa siiqite. Taani inttena siiqidoogaadankka, intte issoi issuwaa siiqana bessees.

English Sentences: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples, if ye have love one to another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte issoi issuwaara siiqettikko, ta erissiyo ashkkarata gidiyoogaa asai ubbai erana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Simon Peter said unto him, Lord, whither goest thou? Jesus answered him, Whither I go, thou canst not follow me now; but thou shalt follow me afterwards.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoon PHeexiroosi Yesuusa, "Godau, neeni au bai?" yaagiis. Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani biyoosaa neeni ha77i tana kaallanau danddayakka; shin guyyeppe kaallana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Peter said unto him, Lord, why cannot I follow thee now? I will lay down my life for thy sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHeexiroosi, "Godau, taani nena ha77i kaallanau aissi danddayikkinaa? Taani ne gishshau, haiqqanaukka giiga uttaas!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered him, Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake? Verily, verily, I say unto thee, The cock shall not crow, till thou hast denied me thrice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Ta gishshau haiqqanau hai tumu giiga uttadii? Taani neeyyo tumaa odais; kuttoi waassanaappe kase, neeni tana heezzutoo kaddana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Let not your heart be troubled: ye believe in God, believe also in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarata, "Intte wozanai hirggoppo; Xoossaa ammanite; tanakka ammanite.

English Sentences: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta Aawaa keettan daro sohoi de7ees. Hegaa gidennaakko, taani intteyyo hegaa yootikke; taani intteyyo sohuwaa giigissanau bais.

English Sentences: And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani baada sohuwaa giigissoogaappe guyyiyan, taani de7iyoosan inttekka de7ana mala, simmada yaada inttena taakko ekka efaana.

English Sentences: And whither I go ye know, and the way ye know.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi intte taani biyo ogiyaa ereeta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Thomas saith unto him, Lord, we know not whither thou goest; and how can we know the way?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Toomaasi, "Godau, neeni biyoosaa nuuni erokko; ogiyaa waanidi eranau danddayiyoonii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Ogee, tumainne de7oi tana; ta baggaarappe attin, ooninne ta Aawaakko baanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: If ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also: and from henceforth ye know him, and have seen him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte tana eriyaabaa gidiyaakko, ta Aawaakka erana; ha77ippe doommidi, intte a ereetanne qassi a be7ideta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Philip saith unto him, Lord, shew us the Father, and it sufficeth us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Piliphphoosi Yesuusa, "Godau, Aawaa nuna bessa; hegee nuuyyo gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto him, Have I been so long time with you, and yet hast thou not known me, Philip? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father; and how sayest thou then, Shew us the Father?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi yaagiis; "Taani hagaa keena wodiyaa inttenaara de7inkka, tana erikkii Piliphphoosaa? Tana be7ida urai Aawaakka be7iis; yaatin, neeni woigada, Aawaa nuna bessa gai?

English Sentences: Believest thou not that I am in the Father, and the Father in me? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself: but the Father that dwelleth in me, he doeth the works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Aawaa giddon de7iyoogaa qassi Aawaikka ta giddon de7iyoogaa neeni ammanikkiiyye? Taani intteyyo odiyo qaalaa taani taappe odikke; shin ta giddon de7iya Aawai ba oosuwaa oottees.

English Sentences: Believe me that I am in the Father, and the Father in me: or else believe me for the very works' sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Aawaa giddon de7iyoogaaninne qassi Aawaikka ta giddon de7iyoogan tana ammanite; hegee xayikko, abau a oosuwaabau tana ammanite.

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that believeth on me, the works that I do shall he do also; and greater works than these shall he do; because I go unto my Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; tana ammaniya urai taani oottiyo oosuwaa oottana. Taani Aawaakko biyo gishshau, he urai hagaappe aadhdhiya oosuwaa oottana.

English Sentences: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawai Na7aa baggaara, ta baggaara bonchchettana mala, ta sunttan intte woossiyo ubbabaa taani intteyyo polana.

English Sentences: If ye shall ask any thing in my name, I will do it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ta sunttan tana ai oichchikkokka, taani polana.

English Sentences: If ye love me, keep my commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte tana siiqiyaabaa gidikko, ta azazuwaa naagana.

English Sentences: And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Aawaa woossana; inttenaara merinau de7ana mala, tumatettaa Ayyaanaa, hara minttettiyaagaa intteyyo i immana.

English Sentences: Even the Spirit of truth; whom the world cannot receive, because it seeth him not, neither knoweth him: but ye know him; for he dwelleth with you, and shall be in you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sa7ai he tumatettaa Ayyaanaa be7ennaagaanne erennaagaa gidiyo gishshau, a ekkanau danddayenna; shin i inttenaara de7iyo gishshaunne intte giddon de7ana gishshau, intte a ereeta.

English Sentences: I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani inttena intterkka yeggabeikke; taani simmada inttekko yaana.

English Sentences: Yet a little while, and the world seeth me no more; but ye see me: because I live, ye shall live also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guutta wodiyaappe guyyiyan, sa7ai tana naa77antto be7enna; shin intte tana be7ana; taani paxa de7iyo gishshau, inttekka qassi paxa de7ana.

English Sentences: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father, and ye in me, and I in you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta Aawaa giddon de7iyoogaanne intte ta giddon de7iyoogaa, qassi taani intte giddon de7iyoogaanne intte he gallassi erana.

English Sentences: He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me: and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father, and I will love him, and will manifest myself to him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta azazoi a matan de7iyo asi, qassi he azazuwaakka naagiyaagee, i tana siiqiya asa. Tana siiqiya asa ta Aawaikka siiqees; taanikka a siiqais. Taani ayyo qonccana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Judas saith unto him, not Iscariot, Lord, how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us, and not unto the world?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Asqqoroota gidenna Yihudai Yesuusa, "Godau, neeni ne huuphiyaa sa7aa bessennan, nuna bessana giyoogaa woigada gai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered and said unto him, If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Tana siiqiya ooninne ta qaalaa naagana; ta Aawai a siiqana; qassi ta Aawainne taaninne akko yiidi, aara de7ana.

English Sentences: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings: and the word which ye hear is not mine, but the Father's which sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana siiqenna urai ooninne ta qaalau azazettenna; intte siyiyo qaalai tana kiittida Aawaagaa gidiyoogaappe attin, taagaa gidenna.

English Sentences: These things have I spoken unto you, being yet present with you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani inttenaara issippe de7aidda hagaa intteyyo odaas;

English Sentences: But the Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin Geeshsha Ayyaanai, minttettiyaagee, Aawai ta sunttan kiittanaagee, inttena ubbabaa tamaarissana. Taani intteyyo odido ubbabaakka inttena hassayissana.

English Sentences: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani sarotettaa inttenaara wottais; ta sarotettaa intteyyo immais. Taani sa7ai immiyo sarotettaa malaa immikke. Intte hirggoppitenne yayyoppite.

English Sentences: Ye have heard how I said unto you, I go away, and come again unto you. If ye loved me, ye would rejoice, because I said, I go unto the Father: for my Father is greater than I.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo, Taani bais; shin simmada inttekko yaana giidoogaa siyideta; intte tana siiqidobaa gidiyaakko, taappe Aawai dariyo gishshau, taani Aawaakko biyoogan intte ufaittana shin.

English Sentences: And now I have told you before it come to pass, that, when it is come to pass, ye might believe.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee haniyo wode intte ammanana mala, hegee hanennan de7ishin, haara kasetada taani intteyyo odarggaas.

English Sentences: Hereafter I will not talk much with you: for the prince of this world cometh, and hath nothing in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha sa7aa haariyaagee yiyo gishshau, taani hagaappe sinttan inttenaara keehi haasayikke. Tana i ainne oottanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: But that the world may know that I love the Father; and as the Father gave me commandment, even so I do. Arise, let us go hence.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani Aawaa siiqiyoogaa sa7ai eranau bessees; qassi taanikka Aawai tana azazidoogaadan oottais. Denddi eqqite; hagaappe boos.

English Sentences: I am the true vine, and my Father is the husbandman.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani woine giyo turaayyo tumu ano; goshshanchchai ta Aawaa.

English Sentences: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away: and every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta giddon de7iya aife aifenna turaa mara ubbaa i karees; aifiya turaa mara ubbai kaseegaappe keehi aifanaadan, he maraa xeeraa i qanxxana.

English Sentences: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo ha77i odido qaalaa gaasuwan, intte geeshsha.

English Sentences: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta giddon de7ite; taanikka intte giddon de7ana. Woiniyaa turaa marai anoora issippe de7ennan xayikko, he marai barkka aife aifanau danddayennaagaadan, inttekka ta giddon de7ennan xayikko, aife aifanau danddayekketa.

English Sentences: I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani woine turaayyo ano; intte he turaa marata. Ta giddon de7iya urai, taanikka a giddon de7iyo urai, daro aife aifana; aissi giikko, taani bainnan intterkka ainne oottanau danddayekketa.

English Sentences: If a man abide not in me, he is cast forth as a branch, and is withered; and men gather them, and cast them into the fire, and they are burned.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta giddon de7enna urai tura maradan, karen yeggin melana; melidaagaa shiishshidi taman wottin, i eexxana.

English Sentences: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ta giddon de7ikko, qassi ta qaalaikka intte giddon de7ikko, intte koyidobaa aiba gidinkka woossite; intte ekkana.

English Sentences: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte daro aifiyaa aifikkonne qassi ta erissiyo ashkkarata gidikko, hegan ta Aawai bonchchettana.

English Sentences: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawai tana siiqidoogaadan, taanikka inttena siiqaas; ta siiquwan de7ite.

English Sentences: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta Aawaa azazuwaa naagada a siiquwan de7idoogaadan, inttekka ta azazuwaa naagikko, ta siiquwan de7ana.

English Sentences: These things have I spoken unto you, that my joy might remain in you, and that your joy might be full.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta ufaissai inttenaara de7ana malanne, inttekka daro ufaittana mala, taani hagaa intteyyo yootaas.

English Sentences: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta azazoi hagaa; taani inttena siiqiyoogaadan, inttekka issoi issuwaara siiqettite.

English Sentences: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba shemppuwaa ba laggiyaayyo aattidi immiyoogaappe aadhdhiya siiqoi ooyyookka baawa.

English Sentences: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena azazidobaa ubbaa oottikko, intte ta laggeta.

English Sentences: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ashkkarai ba godai oottiyoobaa erenna gishshau, taani inttena hagaappe sinttau ashkkarata giikke; shin taani inttena ta laggeta gaas. Aissi giikko, ta Aawaappe siyido ubbabaa taani intteyyo yootaas.

English Sentences: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena dooridoogaappe attin, intte tana dooribeekketa. Intte biidi aifiyaa aifana mala, taani inttena sunttaas. Qassi Aawaikka intte ta sunttan woossidobaa ubbaa immana.

English Sentences: These things I command you, that ye love one another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena azaziyoogee hagaa; issoi issuwaara siiqettite.

English Sentences: If the world hate you, ye know that it hated me before it hated you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Sa7ai inttena ixxikko, kasetidi tana ixxidoogaa akeekite.

English Sentences: If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte sa7aabaa gididaakko, sa7ai babaadan inttena siiqana; shin taani inttena sa7aappe dooridoogaappe attin, intte sa7aabaa gidekketa; sa7ai inttena ixxiyoogee hegaassa.

English Sentences: Remember the word that I said unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord. If they have persecuted me, they will also persecute you; if they have kept my saying, they will keep yours also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ashkkarai ba godaappe darenna gaada taani intteyyo odidoogaa hassayite. Eti tana yedettidabaa gidikko, inttenakka yedettana. Eti ta qaalaa naagidabaa gidikko, intte qaalaakka naagana.

English Sentences: But all these things will they do unto you for my name's sake, because they know not him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti tana kiittidaagaa erenna gishshau, ha ubbaa ta gaasuwan eti intte bolli wottana.

English Sentences: If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloak for their sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yaada etau odennabaa gidiyaakko, etau nagara gidenna; shin ha77i eti oottiyo nagaraa gaasoyiyoobi baawa.

English Sentences: He that hateth me hateth my Father also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana ixxiyaagee ta Aawaakka ixxees.

English Sentences: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did, they had not had sin: but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne oottibeenna oosuwaa eta giddon taani oottabeennabaa gidiyaakko, etau nagara gidennan attana; shin ha77i eti taani oottido oosuwaa be7idi, tanakka ta Aawaakka ixxidosona.

English Sentences: But this cometh to pass, that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law, They hated me without a cause.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eta higgiyan, Tana coo ixxidosona geetettidi xaafettidaagee polettana mala, hagee haniis.

English Sentences: But when the Comforter is come, whom I will send unto you from the Father, even the Spirit of truth, which proceedeth from the Father, he shall testify of me:
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin Aawaappe yiya tumatettaa Ayyaanai minttettiyaagee yaana. Taani Aawaappe intteyyo a yeddana; qassi i tabaa markkattana.

English Sentences: And ye also shall bear witness, because ye have been with me from the beginning.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttekka qassi kaseesappe doommidi, tanaara de7iyo gishshau, tabaa markkattana.

English Sentences: These things have I spoken unto you, that ye should not be offended.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani hagaa intte xubettenna mala, intteyyo odaas.

English Sentences: They shall put you out of the synagogues: yea, the time cometh, that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti inttena bantta Aihuda woosa keettaappe kessi yeddana. Hegaa bolli qassi inttena woriya urai Xoossau oottiyoobaa au milatiyo wodee yaana.

English Sentences: And these things will they do unto you, because they have not known the Father, nor me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaa intte bolli oottiyoogee tananne Aawaa erenna gishshassa.

English Sentences: But these things have I told you, that when the time shall come, ye may remember that I told you of them. And these things I said not unto you at the beginning, because I was with you.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti hegaa intte bolli oottiyo wodee gakkiyo wode, taani intteyyo odidoogaa intte hassayana mala, taani intteyyo hagaa odaas. "Taani inttenaara de7iyo gishshau, koiro hegaa intteyyo odabeikke.

English Sentences: But now I go my way to him that sent me; and none of you asketh me, Whither goest thou?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha77i taani tana kiittidaagaakko bais; shin intteppe ooninne, Au bai? giidi tana oichchiyai baawa.

English Sentences: But because I have said these things unto you, sorrow hath filled your heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani hagaa odido gishshau, intte wozanan daro azzanoi de7ees.

English Sentences: Nevertheless I tell you the truth; It is expedient for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I depart, I will send him unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani intteyyo tumaa odais; taani biyoogee intteyyo keha. Aissi giikko, taani baana xayikko, minttettiyaagee inttekko yeenna; shin taani biikko, a inttekko yeddana.

English Sentences: And when he is come, he will reprove the world of sin, and of righteousness, and of judgment:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi minttettiyaagee yiidi, nagaraabaa, xillotettaabaanne pirddaabaa ha sa7aa asaa erissana.

English Sentences: Of sin, because they believe not on me;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nagaraabai asai tana ammanenna gishshassa.

English Sentences: Of righteousness, because I go to my Father, and ye see me no more;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xillotettaabai qassi taani Aawaakko biyo gishshau, intte tana naa77anttuwaa be7ekketa.

English Sentences: Of judgment, because the prince of this world is judged.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa pirddaabai qassi sa7aa haariyaagee pirddettiichchido gishshassa.

English Sentences: I have yet many things to say unto you, but ye cannot bear them now.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intteyyo odiyoobai darobai de7ees; shin ha77i intteyyo gelenna.

English Sentences: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tumatettaa Ayyaanai yiyo wode, inttena tumatetta ubbaakko efaana. Aissi giikko, i ba siyidobaa odanaappe attin, baappe ainne odenna. Qassi sinttappe yaanabaa intteyyo i odana.

English Sentences: He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: I tana bonchchana; aissi giikko, i taayyo de7iyaabaappe ekkidi, intteyyo odana.

English Sentences: All things that the Father hath are mine: therefore said I, that he shall take of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawau de7iyaabai ubbai tabaa; minttettiyaagee tau de7iyaabaappe ekkidi, intteyyo odana taani giidoogee hegaassa.

English Sentences: A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me, because I go to the Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Guutta wodeppe guyyiyan, intte tana be7ekketa; qassi guutta wodeppe guyyiyan, intte tana be7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said some of his disciples among themselves, What is this that he saith unto us, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me: and, Because I go to the Father?
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issooti issooti bantta giddon, "Guutta wodeppe guyyiyan, intte tana be7ekketa; qassi guutta wodeppe guyyiyan, intte tana be7ana; aissi giikko, taani Aawaakko bais giyoogee hegee woigiyoogee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: They said therefore, What is this that he saith, A little while? we cannot tell what he saith.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Guutta wodeppe guyyiyan giyoogee woigiyoogee? I aibau haasayiyaakkonne nuuyyo erettenna" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him, and said unto them, Do ye enquire among yourselves of that I said, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bana oichchanau koyiyoogaa Yesuusi eridi, eta yaagiis; "Taani, Guutta wodeppe guyyiyan, intte tana be7ekketa; qassi guutta wodeppe guyyiyan, intte tana be7ana giidoogau intte issoi issuwaa oichcheetii?

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto you, That ye shall weep and lament, but the world shall rejoice: and ye shall be sorrowful, but your sorrow shall be turned into joy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais. Intte yeekkananne koizzana; shin ha sa7ai ufaittana. Qassi intte azzanana; shin intte azzanoi ufaissa gidana.

English Sentences: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow, because her hour is come: but as soon as she is delivered of the child, she remembereth no more the anguish, for joy that a man is born into the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi maccaasiyaa na7a yelana haniyo wode, ba maaretaa wodee gakkido gishshau, he maaretaabaa hirggausu; shin na7a yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, na7i ha sa7an yelettido ufaissaa gishshau, ba maaretaa hassayukku.

English Sentences: And ye now therefore have sorrow: but I will see you again, and your heart shall rejoice, and your joy no man taketh from you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, inttekka intte wozanan hirggeeta; shin taani naa77anttuwaa inttena be7ana; qassi intte wozanai keehi ufaittana; intte ufaissaa ooninne intteppe ekkenna.

English Sentences: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He gallassi intte tana ainne woossekketa. Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; intte ta sunttan woossiyoobaa ubbaa Aawai intteyyo immana.

English Sentences: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i gakkanaassikka ta sunttan ainne woossibeekketa; intte ufaissai polettana mala, Xoossaa woossite; intte ekkana.

English Sentences: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs: but the time cometh, when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs, but I shall shew you plainly of the Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagaa taani intteyyo leemisuwan yootaas; shin taani leemisuwan yootenna wodee yaana; shin Aawaabaa taani intteyyo qoncciyan odana.

English Sentences: At that day ye shall ask in my name: and I say not unto you, that I will pray the Father for you:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani he gallassi, intte ta sunttan Aawaa woossana; qassi intte gishshau, taani Aawaa woossana giikke.

English Sentences: For the Father himself loveth you, because ye have loved me, and have believed that I came out from God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Aawai ba huuphen inttena siiqees; intte tana siiqiyo gishshaunne taani Aawaa matappe yiidoogaa ammanido gishshau, i inttena siiqees.

English Sentences: I came forth from the Father, and am come into the world: again, I leave the world, and go to the Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Aawaa matappe sa7aa yaas; qassi sa7aa aggada Aawaakko baana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: His disciples said unto him, Lo, now speakest thou plainly, and speakest no proverb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi Yesuusa, "Be7a, ha77i neeni qoncciyan haasayaasa; leemison ainne haasayakka.

English Sentences: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things, and needest not that any man should ask thee: by this we believe that thou camest forth from God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ubbabaa eriyoogaa nuuni ha77i eroos; qassi nena ooninne oichchana mala, neeni koyennaagaa eroos. Hegee nuna neeni Xoossaappe yiidoogaa ammanttees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered them, Do ye now believe?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi eta, "Ha77i ammaneetii?

English Sentences: Behold, the hour cometh, yea, is now come, that ye shall be scattered, every man to his own, and shall leave me alone: and yet I am not alone, because the Father is with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, intte intte soo intte soo laalettiyo wodeenne ta xalaalaa yeggi bayiyo wodee yaana; ha77ikka yiichchiis. SHin Aawai tanaara de7iyo gishshau, ta xalaalaa gidikke.

English Sentences: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ta giddon de7iiddi, saro de7ana mala, taani hagaa intteyyo odaas. Sa7an intte waayettana. SHin minnite; taani sa7aa xoonaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: These words spake Jesus, and lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father, the hour is come; glorify thy Son, that thy Son also may glorify thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan, pude saluwaa xeellidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Aawau, wodee gakkiis; ne Na7ai nena bonchchana mala, neeni ne Na7aa bonchcha.

English Sentences: As thou hast given him power over all flesh, that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni ayyo immido ubbau merinaa de7uwaa i immana mala, asa ubbaa bollan ayyo maataa immadasa.

English Sentences: And this is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai nena issi Xoossaa gididaagaa erana malanne, qassi neeni kiittido Yesuus Kiristtoosa erana mala, hagee merinaa de7o.

English Sentences: I have glorified thee on the earth: I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo oottanau immido oosuwaa polada, nena sa7an bonchchaas.

English Sentences: And now, O Father, glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77ikka qassi Aawau, sa7ai merettanaappe kase ne matan taayyo de7iya bonchchuwan ne sinttan tana bonchcha.

English Sentences: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world: thine they were, and thou gavest them me; and they have kept thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Sa7aa asaappe neeni tau immidoogeeta nenaara eretissaas; eti neegeeta; qassi neeni eta tau immadasa. Eti ne qaalaukka azazettidosona.

English Sentences: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i neeni tau immido ubbabai neeppe yiidoogaa eti eroosona.

English Sentences: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me; and they have received them, and have known surely that I came out from thee, and they have believed that thou didst send me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni tau immido qaalaa taani etau immaas; etikka he qaalaa ekkidosona. Taani ne matappe yiidoogee tuma gidiyoogaa eroosona; eridi neeni tana kiittidoogaakka ammanidosona.

English Sentences: I pray for them: I pray not for the world, but for them which thou hast given me; for they are thine.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani etau woossais; sa7au nena woossikke. SHin neeni tau immido asau woossais; aissi giikko, eti neegeeta.

English Sentences: And all mine are thine, and thine are mine; and I am glorified in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tau de7iya ubbabai nebaa; qassi neeyyo de7iya ubbabaikka tabaa. Taani eta baggaara bonchchettaas.

English Sentences: And now I am no more in the world, but these are in the world, and I come to thee. Holy Father, keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me, that they may be one, as we are.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hagaappe guyyiyan, sa7an de7ikke; eti sa7an de7oosona; taani ha77i neekko bais. Geeshsha Aawau, ha neeni tau immidoogeeti neeninne taani issuwaa gidiyoogaadan, eti issuwaa gidana mala, eta ne sunttan naaga.

English Sentences: While I was with them in the world, I kept them in thy name: those that thou gavest me I have kept, and none of them is lost, but the son of perdition; that the scripture might be fulfilled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani etaara sa7an de7aidda, neeni tau immido ne sunttaa wolqqan eta naagaas. Taani eta naagaas; Xoossaa maxaafai giidoogee polettana mala, xayoi bessiyo uraappe attin, etappe harai ooninne xayibeenna.

English Sentences: And now come I to thee; and these things I speak in the world, that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77i taani neekko bais; eta wozanan ta ufaissai polettana mala, hagaa taani sa7an haasayais.

English Sentences: I have given them thy word; and the world hath hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani etau ne qaalaa immaas; taani sa7aassa gidennaagaadan, etikka sa7aassa gidenna gishshau, sa7ai eta ixxiis.

English Sentences: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni xalahiyaappe eta naagana mala woossiyoogaappe attin, sa7aappe kessana mala woossikke.

English Sentences: They are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani sa7aassa gidennaagaadan, etikka sa7aassa gidokkona.

English Sentences: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tumatettan eta nebaa ootta; ne qaalaikka tumatettaa.

English Sentences: As thou hast sent me into the world, even so have I also sent them into the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana sa7aa kiittidoogaadan, taanikka eta sa7aa kiittaas;

English Sentences: And for their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi eti tumatettan nebaa gidana mala, eta gishshau, taani ta huuphiyaa neeyyo immais.

English Sentences: Neither pray I for these alone, but for them also which shall believe on me through their word;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani eta xalaalau woossikke; shin eti qaalaa yootin, tana ammanidaageetuyyookka woossais.

English Sentences: That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us: that the world may believe that thou hast sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbai issuwaa gidana mala, taani woossais. Aawau, neeni ta giddon de7iyoogaadan, qassi taanikka ne giddon de7iyoogaadan, eti nu giddon de7ona. Qassi neeni tana kiittidoogaa sa7ai ammanana mala, eti issuwaa gidona.

English Sentences: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them; that they may be one, even as we are one:
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeninne taani issuwaa gidiyoogaadan, eti issuwaa gidana mala, neeni tana bonchchidoogaadan, taanikka eta bonchchaas.

English Sentences: I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me, and hast loved them, as thou hast loved me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta giddon de7in, neeni ta giddon de7in, qassi neeni tana siiqiyoogaadan, etakka siiqidoogaanne tana sa7aa kiittidoogaa sa7ai eranaadan, eti muleera issuwaa gidona.

English Sentences: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aawau, sa7ai merettanaappe kase neeni tana siiqido gishshau, tau immido ta bonchchuwaa eti be7ana mala, neeni tau immidoogeeti taani de7iyoosan tanaara de7ana mala koyais.

English Sentences: O righteous Father, the world hath not known thee: but I have known thee, and these have known that thou hast sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xillo Aawau, sa7ai nena erenna; shin taani nena erais. Qassi neeni tana kiittidoogaa hageeti eroosona.

English Sentences: And I have declared unto them thy name, and will declare it: that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them, and I in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana siiqido siiqoi eta giddon de7ana mala, qassi taanikka eta giddon de7ana mala, taani ne sunttaa eta erissaas; sinttaukka erissana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When Jesus had spoken these words, he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron, where was a garden, into the which he entered, and his disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa giidi, Xoossaa woossidoogaappe guyyiyan, ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura Qediroona giyo shaafaa pinniis. He sohuwan daro wogarai de7ees; Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati he wogaraa giddo gelidosona.

English Sentences: And Judas also, which betrayed him, knew the place: for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa aatti immida Yihudai he sohuwaa erees; aissi giikko, Yesuusi ubba wode ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura hegan shiiqees.

English Sentences: Judas then, having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees, cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yihudai paanoosiyaa, xomppiyaa, tooraanne gonddalliyaa oiqqida daro wotaaddaratanne qassi qeese halaqatinne Parisaaweti yeddido Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata kaaletti ekkidi, he sohuwaa biis.

English Sentences: Jesus therefore, knowing all things that should come upon him, went forth, and said unto them, Whom seek ye?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi bana gakkana haniya ubbabaa eridi, gaxi kiyidi, "Oona koyeetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They answered him, Jesus of Nazareth. Jesus saith unto them, I am he. And Judas also, which betrayed him, stood with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti zaaridi, "Naazireeta Yesuusa koyoos" yaagidosona. Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani a" yaagiis. Yesuusa aatti immida Yihudaikka hegan etaara eqqiis;

English Sentences: As soon then as he had said unto them, I am he, they went backward, and fell to the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Taani a" giido wode, eti guyyekko shiiqidi, sa7an kunddidosona.

English Sentences: Then asked he them again, Whom seek ye? And they said, Jesus of Nazareth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qassikka, "Oona koyeetii?" Yaagin eti, "Naazireeta Yesuusa koyoos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Jesus answered, I have told you that I am he: if therefore ye seek me, let these go their way:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani a gidiyoogaa intteyyo yootaas; simmi intte tana koyiyaabaa gidikko, hageeta yeddite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: That the saying might be fulfilled, which he spake, Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none.
Wolaitta Sentences: I, "Aawau, neeni tau immidoogeetuppe harai atto, issuwaakka bashshabeikke" giidoogee polettana mala, hegaa giis.

English Sentences: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it, and smote the high priest's servant, and cut off his right ear. The servant's name was Malchus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoon PHeexiroosau bisoi de7ees; i he bisuwaa shoddinnee qeese ubbatu halaqaa ashkkaraa ushachcha haittaa shocidi, qanxxi yeggiis. He ashkkaraa sunttai Malkkoosa.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto Peter, Put up thy sword into the sheath: the cup which my Father hath given me, shall I not drink it?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi PHeexiroosa, "Ne bisuwaa shoohuwan zaarada wotta! Ta Aawai taayyo immido burccukkuwaappe taani uyennabaa neeyyo milatii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus, and bound him,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaalaqai, daro wotaaddaratinne qassi Aihudatu halaqati Yesuusa oiqqidi qachchidosona.

English Sentences: And led him away to Annas first; for he was father in law to Caiaphas, which was the high priest that same year.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro Yesuusa Haannakko efiidosona; aissi giikko, Haanni he laitti qeese ubbatu halaqa gidiya Qayaafa bollo.

English Sentences: Now Caiaphas was he, which gave counsel to the Jews, that it was expedient that one man should die for the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Asa ubbaa gishshau, issi asi haiqqikko lo77o" giidi Aihudata zoridaagee Qayaafa.

English Sentences: And Simon Peter followed Jesus, and so did another disciple: that disciple was known unto the high priest, and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoon PHeexiroosinne hara issi erissiyo ashkkarai Yesuusa kaallidi biidosona. He hara erissiyo ashkkaraa qeese ubbatu halaqai loitti erees; hegee Yesuusaara qeese ubbatu halaqaa dirssa garssi geliis.

English Sentences: But Peter stood at the door without. Then went out that other disciple, which was known unto the high priest, and spake unto her that kept the door, and brought in Peter.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi kareera dirssaa penggen eqqiis. Qeese ubbatu halaqai loitti eriyo hara erissiyo ashkkarai kare kiyidi, penggiyaa naagiya na7eeyyo yootidi, PHeexiroosa dirssa garssi gelissiis.

English Sentences: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter, Art not thou also one of this man's disciples? He saith, I am not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Penggiyaa naagiya na7iyaa PHeexiroosa, "Neeni ha bitanee erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issuwaa gidikkiiyye?" yaagaasu. Yaagin PHeexiroosi, "CHii, taani gidikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the servants and officers stood there, who had made a fire of coals; for it was cold: and they warmed themselves: and Peter stood with them, and warmed himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai meeggiyo gishshau, ashkkaratinne halaqati xiixinttaa tamaa oittidi, bonqqidaagaa yuuyi aadhdhi eqqidi ho77oosona; PHeexiroosikka etaara eqqidi, he tamaa ho77ees.

English Sentences: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples, and of his doctrine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese ubbatu halaqai Yesuusa i erissiyo ashkkaratubaanne a timirttiyaabaa oichchiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered him, I spake openly to the world; I ever taught in the synagogue, and in the temple, whither the Jews always resort; and in secret have I said nothing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani asa ubbau qoncciyan odaas. Taani Aihuda ubbai shiiqiyo Aihuda woosa keettaaninne Beeta Maqidasiyan ubba wode tamaarissaas; geeman ainne haasayabeikke.

English Sentences: Why askest thou me? ask them which heard me, what I have said unto them: behold, they know what I said.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, neeni tana aissi oichchai? Taani odidoogaa siyida asaa oichcha; he asai taani odidoogaa erees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had thus spoken, one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand, saying, Answerest thou the high priest so?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa giido wode, he sohuwan eqqida wotaaddaratuppe issoi Yesuusa baqqidi, "Qeese ubbatu halaqaa bolli hagaadan zaarai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered him, If I have spoken evil, bear witness of the evil: but if well, why smitest thou me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani balabaa haasayidabaa gidikko, hagan de7iya asa ubbau oda; shin taani tumaa haasayidabaa gidikko, tana aissi baqqai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Haanni, qashetti uttida Yesuusa, qeese ubbatu halaqaa, Qayaafakko yeddiis.

English Sentences: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself. They said therefore unto him, Art not thou also one of his disciples? He denied it, and said, I am not.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi hegan eqqidi, tamaa ho77ees; harati a, "Neeni ha bitanee erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issuwaa gidikkiiyye?" yaagiis. Yaagin PHeexiroosi, "CHii; taani gidikke" yaagidi kaddiis.

English Sentences: One of the servants of the high priest, being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off, saith, Did not I see thee in the garden with him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese ubbatu halaqaa ashkkaratuppe issoi, PHeexiroosi haittaa qanxxido bitaniyaa dabboi PHeexiroosa, "Taani nena aara daro wogaraa giddon be7abeikkinaayye?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: Peter then denied again: and immediately the cock crew.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin PHeexiroosi qassikka kaddiis; sohuwaarakka kuttoi waassi aggiis.

English Sentences: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment: and it was early; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall, lest they should be defiled; but that they might eat the passover.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yesuusa Qayaafa sooppe deriyaa haariyaagaa ooso keettaa ekki efiidosona. Sa7ai maallado guura; Aihudati Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassa qumaa maanau, bantta huuphessi tunenna mala, deriyaa haariyaagaa ooso keettaa gelibookkona.

English Sentences: Pilate then went out unto them, and said, What accusation bring ye against this man?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, PHilaaxoosi etakko kare kiyidi, "Ha bitaniyaa intte aibin mooteetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They answered and said unto him, If he were not a malefactor, we would not have delivered him up unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti, "I iitabaa oottibeennabaa gidiyaakko, nuuni a neekko ehookko" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then said Pilate unto them, Take ye him, and judge him according to your law. The Jews therefore said unto him, It is not lawful for us to put any man to death:
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi zaaridi etayyo, "Intte a ekki efiidi, intte higgee giyoogaadan, a bolli pirddite" yaagiis. Yaagin Aihudati, "Oonanne woriyo maati nuuyyo baawa" yaagidosona;

English Sentences: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled, which he spake, signifying what death he should die.
Wolaitta Sentences: hagee hanidoogee Yesuusi ai mala haiquwaa haiqqanaakko erissanau haasayidoogee polettanaassa.

English Sentences: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again, and called Jesus, and said unto him, Art thou the King of the Jews?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi ba ooso keettaa naa77anttuwaa gelidi, Yesuusa xeesiis; xeesidi, "Neeni Aihuda kawoo?" yaagidi a oichchiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered him, Sayest thou this thing of thyself, or did others tell it thee of me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi PHilaaxoosa, "Ha oishaa neeni neeppe oichchaiyye woi hara asi neeyyo tabaa odidee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Pilate answered, Am I a Jew? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me: what hast thou done?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi zaaridi, "Tana Aihuda asa gai? Ne zaretinne qeesetu halaqati nena tau aatti immidosona; neeni ai oottadii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered, My kingdom is not of this world: if my kingdom were of this world, then would my servants fight, that I should not be delivered to the Jews: but now is my kingdom not from hence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Ta kawotettai ha sa7aana gidenna. Ta kawotettai ha sa7aana gididaakko, tana Aihudatuyyo aatti immennaadan, ta ashkkarati tau olettana; shin ta kawotettai ha sa7aana gidenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Pilate therefore said unto him, Art thou a king then? Jesus answered, Thou sayest that I am a king. To this end was I born, and for this cause came I into the world, that I should bear witness unto the truth. Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa, "Yaatin, neeni kawooyye?" yaagidi oichchiis. Yesuusi zaaridi, "Neeni tana kawo gaasa. Taani tumatettaayyo markkattana gishshau yelettaas; qassi hegaa gishshau, ha sa7aa yaas. Tumaa bagga gidiya ooninne taani giyoogaa siyees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Pilate saith unto him, What is truth? And when he had said this, he went out again unto the Jews, and saith unto them, I find in him no fault at all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHilaaxoosi, "Tumatetti aibee?" yaagiis. PHilaaxoosi hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan, Aihudatukko kare kiyidi, "Taani aani ai balanne demmabeikke.

English Sentences: But ye have a custom, that I should release unto you one at the passover: will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi, issi asa taani intteyyo qashuwaappe birshshiyo meezee de7ees; taani intteyyo Aihudatu kawuwaa birshshiyoogaa koyeetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then cried they all again, saying, Not this man, but Barabbas. Now Barabbas was a robber.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaaridi, bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Barbbaana birshshappe attin, a gidenna!" yaagidosona. SHin Barbbaani pangga.

English Sentences: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus, and scourged him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa oiqqidi, lissuwan garafiis.

English Sentences: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns, and put it on his head, and they put on him a purple robe,
Wolaitta Sentences: Wotaaddarati agunttaappe akiliiliyaa loittidi, a huuphiyan wottidosona; qassi zo7o maayuwaakka a maizzidosona.

English Sentences: And said, Hail, King of the Jews! and they smote him with their hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Akko shiiqidi, "Aihuda kawuwau, shemppo gam77a!" yaagidi a qinxxalliyaa baqqidosona.

English Sentences: Pilate therefore went forth again, and saith unto them, Behold, I bring him forth to you, that ye may know that I find no fault in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi qassikka kare kiyidi Aihudata, "Be7ite, taani aani ai balanne demmabeennaagaa intte erana mala, a inttekko kare kessana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then came Jesus forth, wearing the crown of thorns, and the purple robe. And Pilate saith unto them, Behold the man!
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi agunttaa akiliiliyaa ba huuphiyan wottidi, zo7o maayuwaa maayidi, kare kiyiis; PHilaaxoosi Aihudata, "Bitaniyaa hagaa be7ite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him, they cried out, saying, Crucify him, crucify him. Pilate saith unto them, Take ye him, and crucify him: for I find no fault in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqatinne wotaaddarati a be7ido wode, bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada a kaqqa! Kaqqa!" yaagidosona. Yaagin PHilaaxoosi eta, "Intte a ekki efiidi, masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqite; aissi giikko, taani ai balanne demmabeikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The Jews answered him, We have a law, and by our law he ought to die, because he made himself the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati zaaridi, "Nuuyyo higgee de7ees; nu higgee giyoogaadan, i haiqqanau bessees; aissi giikko, i bana Xoossaa Na7aa oottiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: When Pilate therefore heard that saying, he was the more afraid;
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi hegaa siyido wode, kaseegaappe keehi yayyiis.

English Sentences: And went again into the judgment hall, and saith unto Jesus, Whence art thou? But Jesus gave him no answer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka PHilaaxoosi ba ooso keettaa simmi gelidi Yesuusa, "Neeni auppe yaadii?" yaagidi oichchiis; shin Yesuusi ayyo ainne zaaribeenna.

English Sentences: Then saith Pilate unto him, Speakest thou not unto me? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee, and have power to release thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, PHilaaxoosi a, "Tau yootikkii? Nena birshshanau woi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada kaqqanau tau maati de7iyoogaa erikkiiyye?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus answered, Thou couldest have no power at all against me, except it were given thee from above: therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Xoossai neeyyo bollappe maataa immibeennabaa gidiyaakko, neeyyo ta bolli maati de7enna shin. Hegaa gishshau, tana neeyyo aatti immidaagee aadhdhiya nagaraa oottiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him: but the Jews cried out, saying, If thou let this man go, thou art not Caesar's friend: whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi hegaa siyido wode, Yesuusa birshshanau oge koyiis; shin Aihudati bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Neeni a birshshiyaabaa gidikko, Kawuwaa Qeesaara dabbo gidakka! Bana kawo giya ooninne Qeesaara morkke!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: When Pilate therefore heard that saying, he brought Jesus forth, and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement, but in the Hebrew, Gabbatha.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi hegaa siyidi, Yesuusa kare kessiis. Yaatidi shuchchaa baasidi kessidosaa giyoosan pirdda oidiyan uttiis; Ibraisxxe qaalan he sohoi gabataa giyoogaa.

English Sentences: And it was the preparation of the passover, and about the sixth hour: and he saith unto the Jews, Behold your King!
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassai Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassau giigissiyo gallassa; sa7ai usuppun saate heera gidana. PHilaaxoosi Aihudata, "Intte kawuwaa hagaa be7ite!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But they cried out, Away with him, away with him, crucify him. Pilate saith unto them, Shall I crucify your King? The chief priests answered, We have no king but Caesar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Aihudati bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Digga! Digga! Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada kaqqa!" yaagidosona. PHilaaxoosi zaaridi, "Intte kawuwaa taani masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada kaqqiyoogaa koyeetii?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin qeese halaqati, "Qeesaarappe hara kawoi nuuyyo baawa!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified. And they took Jesus, and led him away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, eti masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi, Yesuusa kaqqana mala, PHilaaxoosi etau aatti immiis. Eti Yesuusa oiqqidi, ekki efiidosona.

English Sentences: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull, which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba masqqaliyaa tookkidi, Guuggiyaa Sohuwaa giyoosaa biis. "Guuggiyaa Sohuwaa" giyoogee Ibraisxxe qaalan "Golggottaa" giyoogaa.

English Sentences: Where they crucified him, and two other with him, on either side one, and Jesus in the midst.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti he sohuwan masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi, Yesuusa kaqqidosona; qassi aara hara naa77u asata, issuwaa ya baggaara qassi issuwaa ha baggaara Yesuusa gidduwan wottidi, masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqidosona.

English Sentences: And Pilate wrote a title, and put it on the cross. And the writing was, JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi xifatiyaa xaafidi, masqqaliyaa bolli wottiis. I xaafidoogee, "Aihudatu Kawuwaa, Naazireeta Yesuusa" yaagees.

English Sentences: This title then read many of the Jews: for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city: and it was written in Hebrew, and Greek, and Latin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettidosai katamaa matan de7iyo gishshau, daro Aihudati he xifatiyaa nabbabidosona. Xifatee Ibraisxxe qaalan, Roomaisxxe qaalaaninne Giriike qaalan xaafettiis.

English Sentences: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate, Write not, The King of the Jews; but that he said, I am King of the Jews.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Aihuda qeese halaqati PHilaaxoosa, "Ha bitanee bana Aihuda kawo yaagiis gaada xaafappe attin, Aihuda kawo gaada xaafoppa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Pilate answered, What I have written I have written.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHilaaxoosi, "Taani xaafidoogaa xaafarggaas" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: Then the soldiers, when they had crucified Jesus, took his garments, and made four parts, to every soldier a part; and also his coat: now the coat was without seam, woven from the top throughout.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wotaaddarati masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi, Yesuusa kaqqidoogaappe guyyiyan, a maayuwaa ekkidi, oiddu kessi shaakkidosona; issi issi wotaaddaraa issi shaahoi gakkiis. A adussa maayuwaakka ekkidosona; adussa maayoi hashiyaappe doommidi, duge gakkanaassi yeda maayettiyaabaappe attin, qanxxettidi sikettibeenna.

English Sentences: They said therefore among themselves, Let us not rend it, but cast lots for it, whose it shall be: that the scripture might be fulfilled, which saith, They parted my raiment among them, and for my vesture they did cast lots. These things therefore the soldiers did.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wotaaddarati issoi issuwaa, "Oona gakkanaakko, saamaa yegganaappe attin, maayuwaa peerokko" yaagidosona. Hegee hanidoogee Xoossaa maxaafai, "Ta maayuwaa shaakki ekkidosona; ta adussa maayuwan saamaa yeggidosona" giyoogee polettanaassa. Hegaa gishshau, wotaaddarati hegaa oottidosona.

English Sentences: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother, and his mother's sister, Mary the wife of Cleophas, and Mary Magdalene.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusa masqqaliyaa matan a aayyiyaa, a aayee michchiyaa, Qaliyoopha machchiyaa Mairaamanne Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaama eqqidosona.

English Sentences: When Jesus therefore saw his mother, and the disciple standing by, whom he loved, he saith unto his mother, Woman, behold thy son!
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba aayyiyaanne i siiqiyo erissiyo ashkkarai hegan eqqidaageeta be7idi, ba aayyiyo, "Ha mishiree, ne na7aa hagaa be7a!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then saith he to the disciple, Behold thy mother! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, he erissiyo ashkkaraa, "Ne aayyiyo hanno be7a!" yaagiis. He erissiyo ashkkarai o he saatiyaappe doommidi, ba soo ekki efiis.

English Sentences: After this, Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished, that the scripture might be fulfilled, saith, I thirst.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi ubbabai ha77i polettidoogaa eridi, Xoossaa maxaafai giidoogee polettana mala, "Tana saammees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar: and they filled a spunge with vinegar, and put it upon hyssop, and put it to his mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwan issi xuggaa kumida caala woine eessai de7ees. Eti ispponjjiyaa he woine eessan yeggidi, hiisoophphe giyo mittaa xeeran wottidi, Yesuusa doonaakko shiishshidosona.

English Sentences: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar, he said, It is finished: and he bowed his head, and gave up the ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi woine eessaa ganxxi be7idoogaappe guyyiyan, "Polettiis" yaagiis. Qassi hegaappe guyyiyan, ba huuphiyaa ziqqi oottidi, ba shemppuwaa immiis.

English Sentences: The Jews therefore, because it was the preparation, that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day, (for that sabbath day was an high day,) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken, and that they might be taken away.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassai giigettiyo gallassa gidiyo gishshaunne qassi he Sambbatai daro bonchcho gidiyo gishshau, Sambbatan asatu ahai masqqaliyaa bolli pe7enna mala, kaqettida asatu suiliyaa menttidi, masqqaliyaappe wottana mala, Aihudati PHilaaxoosa woossidosona.

English Sentences: Then came the soldiers, and brake the legs of the first, and of the other which was crucified with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, wotaaddarati yiidi, Yesuusaara kaqettida koiro bitaniyaa suiliyaa menttidosona; qassi aara kaqettida naa77antto bitaniyaa suiliyaakka menttidosona.

English Sentences: But when they came to Jesus, and saw that he was dead already, they brake not his legs:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusakko yiido wode i haiqqiichchidoogaa be7idi, a suiliyaa menttibookkona.

English Sentences: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side, and forthwith came there out blood and water.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, wotaaddaratuppe issoi a miyyiyaa tooran caddiis; caddin sohuwaarakka suuttainne haattai goggi bayiis.

English Sentences: And he that saw it bare record, and his record is true: and he knoweth that he saith true, that ye might believe.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ammanana mala, hagaa be7idaagee markkattiis; i markkattiyoogeekka tumaa; qassi ba haasayai tuma gidiyoogaa i erees.

English Sentences: For these things were done, that the scripture should be fulfilled, A bone of him shall not be broken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee hanidoogee Xoossaa maxaafai, "A meqettatuppe issoinne meqqenna" giidoogee polettanaassa.

English Sentences: And again another scripture saith, They shall look on him whom they pierced.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Xoossaa maxaafai harai, "Asai ba caddidoogaa be7ana" yaagees.

English Sentences: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea, being a disciple of Jesus, but secretly for fear of the Jews, besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus: and Pilate gave him leave. He came therefore, and took the body of Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Armmaatiyaasa giyo katamaappe yiida Yooseefi Yesuusa ahaa ekki efaanau PHilaaxoosa woossiis; Yooseefi Aihudatuyyo yayyido gishshau, asi erennan Yesuusa kaalliyaagaa. Yooseefi woossin PHilaaxoosi, "Ekkada efa" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, Yooseefi biidi, Yesuusa ahaa ekki efiis.

English Sentences: And there came also Nicodemus, which at the first came to Jesus by night, and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes, about an hundred pound weight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Niqoodimoosi hegaappe kase Yesuusakko qammi yiidaagee, karbbiyaaranne godare uuttaara walahettida oitamanne ichchashu kilo giraame gidiyaagaa keena shittuwaa oiqqi ekkidi, Yooseefaara yiis.

English Sentences: Then took they the body of Jesus, and wound it in linen clothes with the spices, as the manner of the Jews is to bury.
Wolaitta Sentences: He naa77u asati Yesuusa ahaa ekkidi, Aihudati ahaa xaaxiyo maaraadankka, shittuwaara gattidi, liinuwaa giyo afalan xaaxidosona.

English Sentences: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden; and in the garden a new sepulchre, wherein was never man yet laid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettido sohuwan daro wogarai de7ees; he wogara giddon shuchchaa wooci kessido biron ooninne moogettibeenna ooratta gonggoloi de7ees.

English Sentences: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews' preparation day; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gonggoloi matan de7iyo gishshaunne qassi Aihudati Sambbatau giigettiyo gallassa gidiyo gishshau, Yesuusa yaani wottidosona.

English Sentences: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early, when it was yet dark, unto the sepulchre, and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woggaa gallassi guuran, biron daabidaabiyaagan, Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaama Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaakko baasu; baada shuchchai he gonggoluwaa doonaappe denddiichchidaagaa be7aasu.

English Sentences: Then she runneth, and cometh to Simon Peter, and to the other disciple, whom Jesus loved, and saith unto them, They have taken away the LORD out of the sepulchre, and we know not where they have laid him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoon PHeexiroosakkonne Yesuusi siiqiyo hinkko erissiyo ashkkaraakko, a woxxaidda baada, "Gonggoluwaappe Godaa ekki efirggidosona; awan a wottidaakkonne nuuni erokko" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Peter therefore went forth, and that other disciple, and came to the sepulchre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, PHeexiroosinne hinkko erissiyo ashkkarai aggidi, gonggoluwaakko biidosona.

English Sentences: So they ran both together: and the other disciple did outrun Peter, and came first to the sepulchre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77aikka issippe woxxidosona; shin hinkko erissiyo ashkkarai PHeexiroosappe aadhdhidi kasetidi, he gonggoluwaakko gakkiis.

English Sentences: And he stooping down, and looking in, saw the linen clothes lying; yet went he not in.
Wolaitta Sentences: He erissiyo ashkkarai hokkidi, liinuwaa giyo afalaa be7iis; shin giddo gelibeenna.

English Sentences: Then cometh Simon Peter following him, and went into the sepulchre, and seeth the linen clothes lie,
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoon PHeexiroosi a kaallidi yiidi, gonggoluwaa giddo geliis. Gelidi liinuwaa giyo afalai hegan de7iyaagaa be7iis;

English Sentences: And the napkin, that was about his head, not lying with the linen clothes, but wrapped together in a place by itself.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi Yesuusa huuphiyan xaaxetti uttida afalai he xaaxettidoogaadankka dumma issisan de7iyaagaa be7iis; he afalai dumma de7eesippe attin, liinuwaa giyo afalaara issippe de7enna.

English Sentences: Then went in also that other disciple, which came first to the sepulchre, and he saw, and believed.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, kasetidi gonggoluwaakko gakkida hinkko erissiyo ashkkarai geliis. Geli be7idi ammaniis.

English Sentences: For as yet they knew not the scripture, that he must rise again from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddanau bessiyoogaa yootiya Xoossaa maxaafaa eti biron akeekiichchibookkona.

English Sentences: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, erissiyo ashkkarati bantta soo simmidi biidosona.

English Sentences: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping: and as she wept, she stooped down, and looked into the sepulchre,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Mairaama he gonggoluwaa doonan eqqada yeekkausu. Yeekkaidda hokkada gonggoluwaa giddo xeellaasu.

English Sentences: And seeth two angels in white sitting, the one at the head, and the other at the feet, where the body of Jesus had lain.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bootta maayuwaa maayida naa77u kiitanchchati Yesuusa ahai zin77idosan issoi huuphessaara issoi tohossaara uttidaageeta be7aasu.

English Sentences: And they say unto her, Woman, why weepest thou? She saith unto them, Because they have taken away my LORD, and I know not where they have laid him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti o, "Mishiree, aissi yeekkai?" yaagidi oichchidosona. Oichchin a, "Asati ta Godaa efirggidosona; eti awan wottidaakkonne taani erikke" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And when she had thus said, she turned herself back, and saw Jesus standing, and knew not that it was Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan, guyye simma xeellada, Yesuusi eqqidaagaa be7aasu. SHin i Yesuusa gididoogaa akeekabeikku.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, why weepest thou? whom seekest thou? She, supposing him to be the gardener, saith unto him, Sir, if thou have borne him hence, tell me where thou hast laid him, and I will take him away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi o, "Mishiree, aissi yeekkai? Oona koyai?" yaagidi oichchiis. Mairaama wogaraa naagiyaagaa gaada, "Godau, neeni ekkidabaa gidikko, a awan wottidaakko, tau yootarkkii; taani a ekka efaana" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto her, Mary. She turned herself, and saith unto him, Rabboni; which is to say, Master.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi o, "Mairaamee" yaagiis. A akko simmada, Ibraisxxe qaalan "Rabunii" yaagaasu; hegaa birshshettai "Tamaarissiyaagoo" giyoogaa.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto her, Touch me not; for I am not yet ascended to my Father: but go to my brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto my Father, and your Father; and to my God, and your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi o, "Taani biron ta Aawaakko babeenna gishshau, tana bochchoppa; shin ta ishanttukko baada, Taani ta Aawaakkonne intte Aawaakko, ta Xoossaakkonne intte Xoossaakko, pude bais giis gaada etau oda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the LORD, and that he had spoken these things unto her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaama Godaa be7idoogaanne iyyo i hegaa odidoogaa baada erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo odaasu.

English Sentences: Then the same day at evening, being the first day of the week, when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews, came Jesus and stood in the midst, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: He Woggaa gallassi omarssi, erissiyo ashkkarati Aihudatuyyo yayyido gishshau, kariyaa koridi, shiiqi uttidaashin, Yesuusi yiidi, eta gidduwan eqqidi, "Sarotettai intteyyo gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had so said, he shewed unto them his hands and his side. Then were the disciples glad, when they saw the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan, ba kushiyaanne ba miyyiyaa eta bessiis; erissiyo ashkkarati Godaa be7ido wode keehi ufaittidosona.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus to them again, Peace be unto you: as my Father hath sent me, even so send I you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi naa77anttuwaakka etau, "Sarotettai intteyyo gido; ta Aawai tana kiittidoogaadan, taanikka inttena kiittais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had said this, he breathed on them, and saith unto them, Receive ye the Holy Ghost:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan, eta bolli ufu giidi shemppiis; qassi, "Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkite.

English Sentences: Whose soever sins ye remit, they are remitted unto them; and whose soever sins ye retain, they are retained.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte atto giido asaa nagarai atto geetettana; intte atto geennaageetu nagarai atto geetettenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But Thomas, one of the twelve, called Didymus, was not with them when Jesus came.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi, Mentte giyo Toomaasi, Yesuusi yiido wode etaara de7enna.

English Sentences: The other disciples therefore said unto him, We have seen the LORD. But he said unto them, Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails, and put my finger into the print of the nails, and thrust my hand into his side, I will not believe.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, hinkko erissiyo ashkkarati Toomaasau, "Nuuni Godaa be7ida!" yaagidosona. SHin Toomaasi etau, "Misimaariyan i cadettido a kushiyan de7iya malaataa be7ennaaninne he malaataa ta biradhdhiyan bochchennan, qassi ta kushiyaa a miyyiyan yedda be7ennan taani ammanikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And after eight days again his disciples were within, and Thomas with them: then came Jesus, the doors being shut, and stood in the midst, and said, Peace be unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saaminttappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati qassikka sooni shiiqi uttidosona; Toomaasikka etaara de7ees. Karee koretti uttidaashin, Yesuusi yiidi, eta gidduwan eqqiis; eqqidi, "Sarotettai intteyyo gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then saith he to Thomas, Reach hither thy finger, and behold my hands; and reach hither thy hand, and thrust it into my side: and be not faithless, but believing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Toomaasa, "Ne kushiyaa haa ehaada, ta kushiyaa be7a, qassi ne kushiyaa haa ehaada, ta miyyiyan yedda be7a, neeni ammaniyaagaa gidanaappe attin, ammanennaagaa gidoppa!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Thomas answered and said unto him, My LORD and my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Toomaasi zaaridi, "Ta Godau, ta Xoossau!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto him, Thomas, because thou hast seen me, thou hast believed: blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Neeni tana be7ido gishshau ammanadasa; be7ennan ammanidaageeti anjjettidaageeta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples, which are not written in this book:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ha maxaafan xaafettibeenna hara daro malaatata ba erissiyo ashkkaratu sinttan oottiis.

English Sentences: But these are written, that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ, the Son of God; and that believing ye might have life through his name.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi i Kiristtoosa, Xoossaa Na7aa gidiyoogaa intte ammanana malanne, qassi a ammanidi a sunttan de7uwaa intte demmana mala, hagee xaafettiis.

English Sentences: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias; and on this wise shewed he himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Xibiriyaadoosa giyo abbaa lanqqiyan ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo naa77anttuwaa beettiis. I etau hagaadan beettiis.

English Sentences: There were together Simon Peter, and Thomas called Didymus, and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee, and the sons of Zebedee, and two other of his disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoon PHeexiroosinne mentte giyo Toomaasi, Qaana Galiilappe yiida Naatinaa7eeli, Zabddiyoosa naatinne Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe hara naa77ati issippe de7oosona.

English Sentences: Simon Peter saith unto them, I go a fishing. They say unto him, We also go with thee. They went forth, and entered into a ship immediately; and that night they caught nothing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoon PHeexiroosi etau, "Taani mole oiqqanau bais" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Nuunikka nenaara baana" yaagidi, kiyidi wolwoluwaa giddo gelidosona; shin eti he gallassi qammi mole ainne oiqqibookkona.

English Sentences: But when the morning was now come, Jesus stood on the shore: but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maallado wonttaara awai kiyanaappe kase, Yesuusi abbaa gaxan eqqiis; shin erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa gididoogaa eribookkona.

English Sentences: Then Jesus saith unto them, Children, have ye any meat? They answered him, No.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Naatoo, mole oiqqibeekketiiyye?" yaagiis. Yaagin eti zaaridi, "Ainne oiqqibookko" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Cast the net on the right side of the ship, and ye shall find. They cast therefore, and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes.
Wolaitta Sentences: I zaaridi, "Intte gitiyaa wolwoluwaappe ushachcha baggakko yeggite; amaridaagaa intte oiqqana" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, gitiyaa ushachcha baggakko yeggin, molee darido gishshau, goochchi kessanaagee eta xooniis.

English Sentences: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter, It is the Lord. Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord, he girt his fisher's coat unto him, (for he was naked,) and did cast himself into the sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi siiqiyo ashkkarai PHeexiroosa, "Hagee Godaattennee!" yaagiis. Simooni PHeexiroosi Godaa i gididoogaa siyido wode, kallo de7iyo gishshau, ba maayuwaa maayidi, abbaa giddo guppi geliis.

English Sentences: And the other disciples came in a little ship; (for they were not far from land, but as it were two hundred cubits,) dragging the net with fishes.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hinkko erissiyo ashkkarati molee kumi uttido gitiyaa goochchiiddi, wolwoluwan abbaappe gaxi kiyidosona; eti abbaappe naa77u xeetu wara keenaa haakkidi de7oosonappe attin, keehi haakkidi de7okkona.

English Sentences: As soon then as they were come to land, they saw a fire of coals there, and fish laid thereon, and bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti abbaappe gaxi kiyido wode, xiixinttaa bonqquwan molee de7iyaagaanne oittaa be7idosona.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto them, Bring of the fish which ye have now caught.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Ha77i intte oiqqido moliyaappe amaridaagaa hammite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Simon Peter went up, and drew the net to land full of great fishes, an hundred and fifty and three: and for all there were so many, yet was not the net broken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoon PHeexiroosi wolwoluwan gelidi, xeetanne ishatamanne heezzu wogga moleti kumi uttido gitiyaa goochchidi, abbaappe gaxi kessiis; molee hegaa keena daro gidinkka gitee daakettibeenna.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto them, Come and dine. And none of the disciples durst ask him, Who art thou? knowing that it was the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Haa yiidi, qan77iyaa qan77ite" yaagiis. Erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoinne, "Neeni oonee?" giidi a oichchanau xalibeenna; aissi giikko, Godaa i gididoogaa eti eridosona.

English Sentences: Jesus then cometh, and taketh bread, and giveth them, and fish likewise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi yiidi, oittaa ekkidi, etau immiis; moliyaakka hegaadan immiis.

English Sentences: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples, after that he was risen from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan, ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo beettishin hagee heezzantto.

English Sentences: So when they had dined, Jesus saith to Simon Peter, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me more than these? He saith unto him, Yea, Lord; thou knowest that I love thee. He saith unto him, Feed my lambs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti qumaa miidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Simoon PHeexiroosa, "Yoona na7au Simoonaa, tana hageetuppe aattada siiqai?" yaagiis. Simoon PHeexiroosi, "Ee Godau, taani nena dosiyoogaa neeni eraasa" yaagiis. Yesuusi a, "Ta dorssa marata heemma" yaagiis.

English Sentences: He saith to him again the second time, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me? He saith unto him, Yea, Lord; thou knowest that I love thee. He saith unto him, Feed my sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qassikka, "Yoona na7au Simoonaa, tana siiqai?" yaagiis. Simoon PHeexiroosi, "Ee Godau, taani nena dosiyoogaa neeni eraasa" yaagiis. Yaagin Yesuusi, "Ta dorssata heemma" yaagiis.

English Sentences: He saith unto him the third time, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time, Lovest thou me? And he said unto him, Lord, thou knowest all things; thou knowest that I love thee. Jesus saith unto him, Feed my sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi heezzanttuwaa, "Yoona na7au Simoonaa, tana dosai?" yaagiis. Yesuusi heezzanttuwaa Simoon PHeexiroosa, "Tana dosai?" yaagidi oichchido gishshau, PHeexiroosi azzanidi, "Godau, neeni ubbabaa eraasa; taani nena dosiyoogaa neeni eraasa" yaagiis. Yaagin Yesuusi, "Ta dorssata heemma.

English Sentences: Verily, verily, I say unto thee, When thou wast young, thou girdedst thyself, and walkedst whither thou wouldest: but when thou shalt be old, thou shalt stretch forth thy hands, and another shall gird thee, and carry thee whither thou wouldest not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeyyo tumaa odais; neeni wodallatettan de7iyo wode, ne xeessan qabattuwaa nerkka gixxada, neeni koyidosaa baasa. SHin cimidoogaappe guyyiyan, ne kushiyaa micca bessaasa. Nena hara urai gixissees; neeni dosennasaakka efees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: This spake he, signifying by what death he should glorify God. And when he had spoken this, he saith unto him, Follow me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa PHeexiroosi ai mala haiquwaa haiqqidi, Xoossaa bonchchissanaakkonne erissanau giis; qassi hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi PHeexiroosa, "Tana kaalla" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Peter, turning about, seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following; which also leaned on his breast at supper, and said, Lord, which is he that betrayeth thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi guyye simmidi, Yesuusi siiqiyo erissiyo ashkkarai baappe guyyeera yiyaagaa be7iis; he erissiyo ashkkarai, kahuwaa miyoosan Yesuusakko shiiqidi a, "Godau, nena aatti immanai oonee?" yaagidaagaa.

English Sentences: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus, Lord, and what shall this man do?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi he erissiyo ashkkaraa be7idi Yesuusa, "Godau, ha bitanee qassi waananee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus saith unto him, If I will that he tarry till I come, what is that to thee? follow thou me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi a, "Taani yaana gakkanaassi i de7ana mala taani koyikko, hegee nena ai metii? Neeni tana kaalla" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren, that that disciple should not die: yet Jesus said not unto him, He shall not die; but, If I will that he tarry till I come, what is that to thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, he erissiyo ashkkarai haiqqenna giyo haasayai ishanttu ubbaakko gakkiis; shin Yesuusi, "Taani yaana gakkanaassi, i de7ana mala, taani koyikko, nena ai metii?" giidoogaappe attin, "Haiqqenna" gibeenna.

English Sentences: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things, and wrote these things: and we know that his testimony is true.
Wolaitta Sentences: He yohuwaabaa markkattidaageenne qassi hegaa xaafidaagee he erissiyo ashkkaraa; a markkatettai tuma gidiyoogaa nuuni eroos.

English Sentences: And there are also many other things which Jesus did, the which, if they should be written every one, I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written. Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi oottido hara darobaikka de7ees; ubbabai huuphiyan huuphiyan xaafettiyaakko, xaafettiya maxaafatuyyo ha mule sa7ai gidanabaa taayyo milatenna.
